review: This game is going very well, but it lacks a lot for the level of G Impact.  I wish this game had a better way to organize the buttons in our style.  A bit robotic in the attack and walk animation.  I hope that with time more item for the champions, and it is rare to see the damage of the adc to the bass with 3 items, maybe I am very used to playing it on pc.  Graphics and design, it is very well done, playability is somewhat weak standing with another game of the same genre, they should bind it more.  I like the game and its content is fine.
review_title: Need more but it‚Äôs ok. Good game Riot Game.

review: When it comes to league of legends it has the same exact feel only slightly better the graphics that were implemented feels sharper and the option for 120fps is really refreshing for people with the iPad pros, overall the game is slightly different character acquisition is easier as they give you a bunch of free ones as you level, overall as a league fan I recommend it highly slightly different but very refreshing.

I‚Äôve played this game religiously since I downloaded it. However my reward for being a loyal player has only gotten me an emerald ranking in ranked and some of the absolute zero question worst team matchmaking system ever. Constantly flooded with trolls and underranked teammates who quite frankly are either just casuals or terrible. Countless double digit kill and assist games have been lost to afk, Disconnected, or the worst teammates u can think of. Quite frankly I‚Äôve given up. The game isn‚Äôt enjoyable or fun anymore and the ranked grind just flat out isn‚Äôt rewarding enough. Sincerely a lost player. Do yourself a favor and just play regular league. Cuz this money grab of a game is just not worth it.

Out play and out smart your opponents? The best joke I heard for the year. The only thing that is out playing and out smarting you is the match making system. You may out play and out smart your opponents however you want and the match making system will pair you with a bunch of bots who skill level is either 2 or 3 times lower than your opponents. Players who have low elo will be pair with players who have higher elo to balance both team. When then game try to balance this so call Elo it just ruin it for everyone. Also the report system is just for show, no one actually get punish for reasons other than verbal abuse which is funny.

So much potential and yet what a waste. Great way to connect with friends and have fun. Only wait‚Ä¶it‚Äôs not that fun because you always have afk players, trolls, and intentional feeders. It‚Äôs one thing if those are in pub matches, but they‚Äôre all the way up to master in ranked. What‚Äôs the penalty. Maybe a small few hour ban. It certainly doesn‚Äôt stop them from doing it. I had fun for about a month then all that has gotten to me. I will be stopping except to play with my friend on occasion. There‚Äôs better things to do with your time.

Also most the people speak Spanish. So good luck understanding your team.

First of all, this game caters to all. There is no ‚Äúpay to play‚Äù advantage. It all comes down to learning your favorite(s) characters. There‚Äôs room for everyone. You can progress from easy to play characters to more advanced, all come with their pros and cons. I‚Äôve been playing for some time and my favorites are the easiest to play. If you‚Äôre looking for a fun, free, multiplayer game‚Ä¶ this is it. Thank you to all the developers to make game reality!

I was driven here by the series arcane on Netflix, this is a great game and alternative to the PC version! As someone who does not have access to a PC to play league it‚Äôs really nice to be able to play it on my phone. The only thing I can suggest is to make it so you‚Äôre pared with people the same skill level as you, being pared with people way higher skill leveled than you and just getting destroyed just damages the experience. Really amazing game overall!

I loved league as a game and concept (it‚Äôs not paid to win) but didn‚Äôt have the time for it, or the computer for it. Wild Rift gives the same fast pace of ARAM but inside Summoner‚Äôs Rift with easy to use mechanics. The graphics are gorgeous and it runs smooth on the iPhone 12. I can play anywhere anytime in as little as 15mins! There‚Äôs so many missions and events that let you earn goodies to use in game without having to spend a dime.

So my only problem with the game is my fault because my thumbs have minds of their own. I don‚Äôt press the right areas but that‚Äôs my bad. Other than my discombobulated thumbs the game is great. I love playing mobile because games aren‚Äôt as long and you get the same satisfaction as playing PC. Thank you for reading and let me know if it was helpful lol. Oh and I hope they get a patch update with twisted treeline so 3v3 is available as well. Please and thank you

The app is really addictive and fun! I could play for hours and not be bored! But this morning I was playing a normal pvp match and after I played there was a penalty notice saying that I was temporarily or permanently banned and I haven‚Äôt done anything against their guide lines. And I worked really hard to build that account. Overall I would say it‚Äôs a great game and I would have rated it 5 stars if this didn‚Äôt happen. I hope I can get my account back sooner or later.
review_title: Really good but banned for no reason

review: In PC league, you would cast Q twice. I feel like it‚Äôs an unnecessary thing on mobile. If you use her Q ability for the first cast, the next cast should be automatically be applied on the next auto. Having to reposition and trying to auto on mobile is hard enough. Adding her q on top of that to the mix makes playing Camille a bit of a hassle to play. Other than that, this is a fun game. Manage to get around 20 champions 5-6 skins for free just from playing the game. Nice.
review_title: Fun game but Camille feels sort of bad

review: Graphics nice, the gameplay nice. What takes it all away is that I get teamed up with players (constantly) going 0/4, 1/6, 2/14, 0/8 on RANK. Like I‚Äôm trying to carry which I have no problem since I main Caitlyn and Kaisa but it‚Äôs really hard when I have players holding me back from winning on RANK. A match takes ALMOST 20 to 30 minutes playing, I DON‚ÄôT WANT TO WASTE TIME PLAYING THE GAME LOSING ON RANK. If it was normal I don‚Äôt care, but I don‚Äôt play norm‚Äôs. Now it don‚Äôt matter I just uninstalled, there‚Äôs no way I go from emerald 3 4 days ago to Platnium 4. I rate this game a 2 stars (I‚Äôm not sure if I‚Äôm being to kind) good thing I don‚Äôt buy skins either!!!!!!!

First of all, the updates and reworks to some of these champs is horrible. Lux and Soraka are boring to play now since this update. No challenge there. The update not only messed up champs but it also doesn‚Äôt show me any highlights of my matches. It just stays loading and freezes my game and I have to close and restart the app. Very frustrating. The few things and champs that I enjoyed are gone now. One more thing the whole reporting players after a match is a waste of time, more often than not im put in the same party as toxic people I ban and I end up losing twice in a row.

This game is so much fun on iPhone, better than the pc in my opinion. The only thing that would make it more immersive and comfortable to play for longer periods of time, would be backbone controller support! Holding the iPhone is uncomfortable at times adding support would add the controllers hands for hand support, plus having physical buttons for control is always better than touch screen.

After playing years of pc league, Wild Rift feels so good to play. It‚Äôs quicker games, doesn‚Äôt feel like an eternity to get going. So if you have 15-20 minutes, you can play a full game. Most of the characters implemented, feel really smooth to play. There‚Äôs a few I haven‚Äôt preferred, but overall A+. I‚Äôm still waiting on Gnar to make it into WR! Keep up with a great version of league for the phone. 

DO NOT SKIP THE TUTORIAL, you‚Äôll thank yourself at the end of it. :)
review_title: DIAMOND PC PLAYER || I PREFER WILD RIFT

review: Absolutely outstanding, no, not perfect, but outstanding for a mobile game. Is it PC league? No, and it shouldn‚Äôt be, I don‚Äôt always have time for 40 min sat down at a computer, but with wild rift I can do 2 games in that time, in a more convenient setting with the same league feel. They are NOT the same game and I‚Äôm happy for it. It‚Äôs faster but with more depth than mobile legends. It just deserves a 5 star rating for what it does

Controls are terrible, the forced auto lock gets you killed on certain champs very easily. There is no way to turn it off and the AI seems to always target the wrong thing. Lot of champs are missing and some of the core ones at that. But they added champs no one even plays which makes 0 sense. Honestly I thought this would beat mobile legends  it I think I‚Äôll go back there and uninstall this. No where near as good as PC or even as good as Mobile Legends....feels like a huge miss from Riot I guess the sellout dulled that blade right down to nothing because you can see the lack of passion they once had.

It doesn‚Äôt make sense how you can only report players right after a match.  If for whatever reason you pass that page you lose the chance.  Can you fix that???  Pretty sure in regular lol you just press the person‚Äôs profile and you can report them.  You press the person‚Äôs profile in wild rift you can only block them.  Make it simple, I don‚Äôt need newbies cursing me out because they don‚Äôt know how to play. Want wild rift to be a safer place? Fix this problem.

DO NOT play solo. More often than not you end up with someone who goes AFK, a team without a jungler, two or even three people playing in mid/solo lane, etc. the matchmaking system is completely terrible, and they do not compensate you nearly enough for a griefing teammate or match you with the same level players. There‚Äôs no point in being SVP consistently on a losing team when the system is tilted against you. 

For example, they only give you +2 toward tier loss protection if a player on your team flat out leaves during the game, but it costs 300 protection points to save one lost mark for a game loss. 

Not worth the energy to play a broken system.

This game is great! I love it, but there are still glitches since it‚Äôs in the early stages. For example, if you can‚Äôt connect to a match, then it repeatedly asks you to reconnect but never seems to be able to do it. If you hit cancel, it logs you out. You log back in, it asks you to reconnect again. Doesn‚Äôt matter what you do, it asks you to reconnect. Fairly annoying glitch, but I‚Äôm sure they‚Äôll correct it given time.
review_title: Totally recommend, but remember it‚Äôs still new to app store

review: When the game maker gives us options to report players such as intentional feeding, bad behavior‚Ä¶ but they dont punish those players at all, unless they are afk. Then what the heck is the point of giving us those options? Game is for relaxing. But ruining someone‚Äôs game just because they dont take the match serious is not fair for other players who try so hard to win, especially in Ranked game. So Riot should remove those options since they cannot do anything with bad players. Riot should have already been professional with this mobile game because they have so many years of experience in the gaming industry.
review_title: Reporting system in this game is such a joke

review: Let me start this off by saying that I was a day 1 player that played daily. I was gone for three days without cell signal on a mini vacation in the woods and came back to see that the guild I founded and lead had been transferred to some random guild member, not even my second-in-command. We were one of the leading guilds. The guild was called Summoner‚Äôs Tavern. Am I not allowed to have a life? It‚Äôs not as if I was gone for an entire week, it was only three days. I tried contacting Riot support to no avail. Typical Riot Games. Since they‚Äôve been acquired by Tencent, customer support has gone way downhill. Not like there was much in the first place.
review_title: They Don‚Äôt Care About You or How Much You‚Äôve Spent

review: At times when you are playing with people on your skill level that play objectives this game is almost perfect like addictively fun .... but omg the matchmaking makes this game unplayable at certain times. It's like WOW like unbelievably bad teammates. Please fix match making so that I can play with people that want to win and actually know how to because I have to take hiatuses from the game because the matchmaking makes me want to pull my hair out and I legit feel an amount of stress that can't be good for me.
review_title: best mobile game I've ever played if the matchmaking weren't so horrible

review:
Climbing the ranked ladder gets really tough once you get to the higher levels. Especially when every 3 games you have an AFK teammate or someone who feeds the other team. 

If someone on your team goes AFK, disconnects, or will receive any sort of disciplinary action after the game then your ranked level shouldn‚Äôt change. 

You didn‚Äôt do anything wrong, you just got queued with the someone having technical difficulties. Therefore, you shouldn‚Äôt be punished for that.
review_title: Bug - Ranked needs to be fixed

review:
Played this for a solid couple weeks, I was skeptical about being able to transfer the same feeing of the computer version to mobile but it actually works super well once you get used to it.

Only problems I‚Äôve been having is long bans for ‚Äúleaving matches‚Äù, when in reality I get into champ select, loading screen, then i can‚Äôt load in to the game so I exit app. Is there any reason for this? My connection is completely fine

It's a shame that matchmaking is terrible in this game. So many trolls and people rage quitting that it's absurd! There's no punishment system for that and that's why they don't care. From Plat up it's a shame that you still feel like you're in bronze or iron because of how bad the matchmaking is. In Plat you can still get golds on your team. I asked friends who are emeralds and diamonds how often do they see gold players. They said they still see them from time to time. The other reviews are true. People afk, rage quit, or just troll by stealing roles or playing unconventional champions not in their intended role.
review_title: Fix Matchmaking or add a punishment system!

review: At least once a day, sometimes multiple times, as I‚Äôm loading for a match, it fails to connect and then kicks me out of the app and forces me to sign in again. Then when I try to sign back in, it tries to reconnect to the March but fails. That goes on for a while and I just leave it be for a while before I try again.
review_title: Great alternative to the desktop version but has some bugs still

review: Abysmal control system.  Matchmaking is a joke. The penalty system for not wanting to stay in a ridiculous match is not worth my time.  The card system leaves you with a sense of inconsistency with farming and level increases. Some characters are completely unbalanced even with the same deck equipped. There really are no set roles. People just go wherever they want. I‚Äôm not sitting in a matched that‚Äôs being dragged out, while I‚Äôm being ganked 5v1 on solo lane while the rest of my team are trying to jungle.  Get it together......also the report system is pretty useless....unless you go afk. Which again is almost necessary given the current community and gameplay.

review: I‚Äôve always heard about League, but never found time to dedicate and learn to play. Now with Wild Rift I can easily jump in. Not only is it approachable (and smooth as butter on the iPhone 12 Pro), but it has totally captivated me and made me get interested into the lore of LoL. I found myself downloading the Mac client of the game today after I watched a cinematic, (I plan to make time now).This is a fun game and I recommend it to people looking for a fun easy and quick game on their phone! Keep up the good work Riot!

The game is really fun to play. I am more writing this because I didn‚Äôt know where we could write our ‚Äúcomplaints.‚Äù I just really wish it wouldn‚Äôt be so easy to end. One ace at level 10, and its game over. Teammate had ten seconds left‚Ä¶ they kill both inhibitor turret and the nexus in that amount of time. Just wish it was a bit more like pc with the extra two turrets in the base.
review_title: Great Game I just wanted to ask for one thing‚Ä¶

review: I like how they picked the most popular champions and also the newest to put in the game I just wish some they would add in some more soon for example there‚Äôs an wide variety for adc supp and tops but I feel that the mage and tank department is lacking like where is volley bear mordikizer kaziden or syndra so many more but what 6  7 mages gets old man only thing I have to say other than that I love this completely just wish they‚Äôd pushes character releases

Going on 5-10 minutes of scrolling through the same pages over and over again and see nothing for customer service.

Made a purchase (skin) during training and have yet to be able to use it in battle.

F2P yes, but, I did spend money for something and am not getting it.

Would be 5 stars if I could easily navigate to customer service.

‚ÄúThe further a business is from their customers, the worse customer service‚Äù.
Was unable to handle this situation in game.
Just a nuisance._.
I could be blind, but I‚Äôm not seeing anything even related to customer service, even in purchase area.  Big red flag and turn off.

Also, how am I either A) getting my money back or B) able to use skin I paid for?

WHERE IS THE CUSTOMER SERVICE?!?

Controls pretty easy to use even on a s series.  Would probably be ideal on a + series screen and/or tablet.
review_title: Great, but CUSTOMER SERVICE IS WHERE?

review:
No ads like ‚Äútraditional mobile games‚Äù plays and feel incredible. I‚Äôve been a PC port player and I can say this game captures 90% of that. 
Controls are well thought out with things such as marking on the map using a combination of click and drag. 
Performance is unbelievable, even when my device is charging, the optimization is so good it doesn‚Äôt make the chip thermal throttle at all. Running LOCKED 60 FRAMES ULTRA SETTINGS AT ALL TIME! (2nd gen iPad Pro and iPhone 12 mini)
review_title: An actually well executed mobile port!

review: For starters I love this game, as someone who can't get all the fancy gaming set ups it's nice when game developers can make a mobile game of their popular games. Now the reason for just a 4 star was because of a pretty bad glitch that just happened. All of my champions, skins, emotes, etc where gone. I was at level 1. I tried closeing and re opening the game about 10 times and it wa the same. Luckly it's all back to normal now and I have everything I've spent $$$ on.

I been playing League Of Legends since 2011 and Wild Rift is League Of Legends at is best on iOS. Wild Rift runs amazing, smooth, graphics are clean, sharp, no glitches ,battery life is some how very efficient for a video game. This game is so well done that it blowup my expectations to space. Thank you Riot Games for taking its time and create a League Of Legends game for iOS.  I‚Äôm playing the game on iPhone 12 Pro Max, my best friends are playing on iPhone XR, iPhone XS and iPad Air 10.9‚Äù  and they have awesome experiences as well as me.
review_title: League Of Legends at is best

review: The matching in the game is always one sided with new players against pros. The updates for the game are super bad it‚Äôs basically the same thing that they take away and bring back over and over. The game is super toxic, filled with most ruthless ppl ever and everyone on the game is super racist. Last but not least the game will literally make you wait more time to join a match if you leave during a game, no matter the reasoning behind on why you left like if a family member needed help or a phone call pops up they will literally warn you and make you wait and hour for 3 matches each time if you leave‚Ä¶. Yeah ik yikes why even play this game tbh.

A wide array of characters to pick from. Regular patches to buff or nerf characters. New events release regularly. Guide helps you pick up the game really quickly. Many different roles to pick from which is a plus. Allows you to try a rotating cast of characters for free. With all the different roles there‚Äôs an option for everyone. While I haven‚Äôt played the PC version this has been great on mobile.

Fun game can be really good but there is a bunch of griefing low Leo. I‚Äôm not sure if it is a lack of understanding how to play or what. Maybe increase number of games to play ranked for brand new accounts that haven‚Äôt played LoL on PC before? I think PC players that accounts are over lvl 30 should be able to play ranked at lvl 10 but the new accounts / players might need more tutorials or help learning what a jungle is or a solo lane. 2 mid in my first ranked game 2p3 dragon lane my second was not fun trying to hard carry.

Ok so they made lol mobile but they can‚Äôt fix the bugs or they give out bans for a weak signal the community is complete trash no player plays their lanes or how a match should be played. Even in co-op people are terrible here‚Äôs a suggestion start giving penalties for those not playing their roles seriously like lol is worse but this one is right up there and the farming for motes process highly underrated I get at max 20 motes for pvp come on get the heck out of here. If you ask me riot programmers etc need to go back to school and learn how mobas are made. If they fixed these issues which they won‚Äôt like all corps they only care about the money they receive sad and pathetic.

1. Preferred position- please don‚Äôt go far as 5th choice. This is just making everyone‚Äôs life miserable and stuck in the game for 20-30 minutes just feeling sick and annoyed not fun    2. AFK - gosh, there‚Äôs got to be a better way to compensate for a teammate going AFK/ leaving. 80 fortitudes don‚Äôt do any thing. Give us protection to not lose a crystal 3. Rank game matching system - like seriously can‚Äôt you guys do better in matching system? The discrepancy in the levels make it so hard to win from the beginning.. 2 diamond and 3 emeralds versus 4 diamonds and 1 emerald? Like wth is this disadvantage from the beginning?? This game is getting worse and worse.

review: When I first started the game it was a little difficult to figure out but the more I played and got use to the controls I really enjoyed it. I love the incredible variety Champions and their amazing abilities, and the voice actors too. Though i would love it if they could make the game more blind person friendly. I use some of my vision but my ears are more useful in battle. It‚Äôs an over all amazing game and love playing it!!!
review_title: This is a really cool game!

review:
There are so many players who would just afk or purposely try to ruin the game for other teammates just because they are angry, and even though you report them you rarely get feedback that your report went through and you can always find players like these in every other ranked game. 
I do really enjoy this game but it‚Äôs such a throw-off when a player purposely throws the match, and when they do you barely get any compensation from the player throwing the match. 
It‚Äôs just really upsetting losing a game you could‚Äôve won.

If you fall asleep while waiting to connect to a match. Or if your kid is choking on something and you have to put your phone down for a few minutes during a match. You will be banned from matchmaking for 24 hours. 
Wild rift seems to think that playing a video game is more important than any other thing in your life. So if you decide to leave a match at any point, for any reason. They will ban you from playing. They want you to finish the match by any means necessary. This no longer makes the game fun. 
This will keep me from putting any money towards this game and will keep me from suggesting it to friends. Very bad way to PLAY A GAME! ITS JUST A GAME!

I have played League of Legends on Summoner‚Äôs Rift since 2013 and it has and always will be one of my favorite games. So imagine my excitement that it became mobile for people who aren‚Äôt always home, as well as you‚Äôre able to connect to your riot account. Everything felt exciting when I was playing through the tutorials even though the mechanics felt touchy, but when I checked my collection I found out I do not have access to my 170 skins and I have to repurchase my favorite ones on the phone. I was really looking forward to my future with this mobile game but it ended sooner than I imagined

I love this game, but in all honesty, the matchmaking for the season has been dog water. Also hurry up and release hecarim. Everyone at riot has been implying that he was going to be released at the end of this event which is tonight, but instead they just announced when they were going to release him a week from now. I got time off today to grind this champion and hopefully get top ranked with him but instead I just got a dumb tweet from riot and less money on my paycheck for it
review_title: Great game but release dates and information are few and far between

review:
I‚Äôm using an iPhone 12 Pro Max and the keyboard is too small and squeezed together to accurately type out to my team in game. The keyboard is also small outside of game. If the keyboard can be improved that would be greatly appreciated. It‚Äôs hard to communicate to the team and it seems everyone is making typos because of the poorly design keyboard 

Most matches have players that quit trying too early or straight up afk. It‚Äôs annoying have 1 out 5 players keep hitting the surrender button every time off cooldown

I have to say I‚Äôve tried and tried again with this game and yet nothing has improved, I‚Äôm quite disappointed that no matter what playing support in ranked is just about impossible. Supports have to rely on a team to get anywhere. I deleted the game for the last time and don‚Äôt plan on getting it back, I can just about guarantee I‚Äôll have more fun and be able to actually rank up in ANY other moba. Not only is ranked the problem but the toxicity is another it‚Äôs not any fun when people are down right disrespectful and take roles they were not assigned to from the beginning. You‚Äôve officially lost a player and the respect of one.

This is probably an unpopular opinion but I‚Äôm enjoying this more than the PC version. It‚Äôs truly phenomenal how great this runs on IOS. I‚Äôve played on both my phone and the iPad and they‚Äôre both great.
The only complaint I have so far is that the estimated wait times are usually WAY off. It may say 35 seconds but it‚Äôs usually up into the minutes until a game actually starts (especially in ranked).

I would love to change my rating as soon as this is fixed, but until then I‚Äôm pretty upset. I‚Äôve been working very hard at playing well, earning my rank protection shields and climbing the ranked ladder. I just recently played a game where our ADC went AFK. He was ‚Äúpunished‚Äù but so was EVERY PLAYER ON OUR TEAM. We all lost a rank, and why? Did we have a fair opportunity to show our skills, NO. It should be a wash for everyone else‚Ä¶ I know this is fixed on the pc version, but having such a heavy penalty on wild rift for just trying to have fun and play game, which very quickly becomes infuriating and no fun when one person leaves is really upsetting.

review:
I‚Äôll start by saying I‚Äôve been playing league on pc since season 3, and with that said I might be a little biased.  But the amount of 1 star reviews are laughable.  I‚Äôve played other mobas on the phone and none of them are as clean as what riot has done.  No it‚Äôs not the pc version but it‚Äôs a whole lot quicker gameplay and fun.  

P.S. add my boy warwick what are you waiting for? Season 2 of arcane with vander becoming warwick or what?
review_title: Don‚Äôt let the haters fool you.

review: I‚Äôve played League since 2012, and was stoked to see it on mobile. Yeah the map isn‚Äôt quite all the same but it does play just like league. I was bummed to find out my account skins and champions didn‚Äôt transfer over when I logged in. Sometimes it doesn‚Äôt want to update and freezes in the loading screen. Still has some bugs to work out but overall I would recommend playing it. It‚Äôs addicting just as bad as it used to be!

I have one complaint about the game. And it‚Äôs the AFK banning! We have lives!!!! Also people have bad connection sometimes. I put my phone down to help my daughter put her shoes on and was kicked from the match and banned for HOURS! Literally if you have to step away for ANYTHING you‚Äôre severely punished. A normal match is anywhere from 20-40 minutes. Not being able to step away for a minute is beyond ridiculous. I think everything else about the game is awesome but the banning and the duration are out of control.

Constant support from developers, mixing it up and keeping it fresh every couple of weeks. Completely free with no adds. You can pay for skins if you want but it‚Äôs not pay to win by any stretch. I plan to play this game for a long time. My wife and I always team up when we play for 20-30 mins a game. Highly accessible and easy to learn to. If I could give it 10 stars I would!

I recently downloaded this game, and I love it. I am less of a mobile gamer and am not a serious mobile gamer, but I like this game a lot. I don‚Äôt have any concerns that I want to address. I like how this game can be challenging and provides 20-30 minutes of playtime each match and is fun and exciting. I don't have the pc game, because I‚Äôm not really into the MOBA genre and only downloaded this game because mobile games are almost always simpler. Not having the PC game, I wouldn't know whether this one is simpler or not, but I enjoy playing regardless.

I played this game a lot when it came out. It‚Äôs pretty good and the game runs well. But I‚Äôm liking it less and less as time goes on for these reasons
-too much going on in main menu with all the events (one event at a time and keep it simple, I don‚Äôt wanna play a turn based rpg in the menu- it‚Äôs dumb)
-level cap past 40 (I‚Äôve been max level since season 2 and it‚Äôs season 6)
-wild pass is decent priced but extremely light on content
-skins are way overpriced- $100 bundle for 5 skins? (greed never served a game company well)

Apparently it‚Äôs bad for other player‚Äôs gaming experience when you say things in chat enough to get chat banned for 7 DAYS, but people can just leave in the middle of the game where you get smoked 4v5 for 20 minutes and that‚Äôs not something that contributes to a bad experience. That‚Äôs weird because I have no control over them leaving and it makes us lose plus get rolled on which makes me tilted and definitely way worse than someone chatting; which I can MUTE and not deal with. This game‚Äôs community will continue to be garbage until something is done about griefing in all aspects.
review_title: Developers are crap. Punishment system is terrible.

review: First of all I like this game. More simplified compared to the pc ver. However, the ranking system needs to be fixed. Makes no sense how every other ranked game, there are complete noobs who literally throw the game. There needs to be harsher punishments for those who throw games or feed intentionally. Please fix the matchups as majority of games are very one-sided‚Ä¶ Clearly the current matchmaking process is not fair or ideal. Also allow skin trades between friends whether it costs some blue motes or poro coins. I think this would be a great addition if there was a trading system so people will get more involved.
review_title: Fun game but needs lot of work

review: This game is really fun and addicting and I love it a lot Jinx is 100% but there‚Äôs one thing that‚Äôs just so annoying! I started the game not to while ago and today I left a game cause I just had some things to do, but when I come back I get a warning saying ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt leave during a game‚Äù like ok I had to just get off to do  something! I hate how it does that, but it‚Äôs still one of my favorite games! The company just has to get their head straight ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

The game is beautiful and really enjoyable. Especially when you find yourself in a well balanced match where any wrong move can shift things to a W.

That said, at times the game doesn‚Äôt provide enough of a challenge. I would like to see the turrets beefed up so that snowballing a lane 5 minutes in doesn‚Äôt end the game. Maybe add a second layer before the nexus? Or increase the turret health and damage?

I don‚Äôt know the exact answer but something is definitely needed.

Been playing the PC version for 8+ years and it seems that SR matches take longer and longer to finish. They keep making the map bigger and champs slower. With Wild Rift it‚Äôs the opposite! Fast games, more gold, quicker champs, and smaller maps. 

I would give you 4 stars because you still haven‚Äôt fixed the audio chat feature. It‚Äôs been like 6 months now. Get it together!

Been playing LOL for 8 years off and on, Wild Rift is simply amazing can‚Äôt really say anything more or less lol. I usually play on P.C but recently moved & no longer have access to a P.C yet so Wild Rift is a savior . Was playing Mobile Legends but as soon as Wild Rift came out I nvr looked back. Wild Rift has every mobile MOBA beat by a long shot graphic wise, complexity, Enjoyment everything u can think of.  Truly love this game & I thank you riot for bringing League to Mobile!!!!

The nostalgia is real with this one, I used to play league of legends almost every day years ago but eventually stopped, I saw this by chance on the App Store and immediately downloaded it, the champion roster is slowly but surely bring back all the old favorites and the gameplay is just what I remember plus more, I‚Äôm amazed they were able to do it but I‚Äôm playing just as much as I used to back in the day!

It‚Äôs a good game although there‚Äôs some toxic players here and there you‚Äôll get used to it. I‚Äôve become addicted to playing it after getting the ropes but one thing I find as a problem is you leaving the match and having a temporary ban. I get that the ban is there due to players rage quitting and such but whenever I leave the game, I needed to do something but after I got back in the game I got a temporary ban. I‚Äôm excited for patch 2.3 although it‚Äôs a good game, there‚Äôs always flaws so they did a good job!

I love the game play its a great adaptation of league of legends. I play it on PC as well. Cant wait for yorick to be added. The only downfall is the limited item pool and the missing rune pages. Kinda makes the game less appealing with the lack of options. Like there are no pink wards or blue wards. Makes invisible champs kinda Over powered like i can even teemo jungle which is kinda sad honestly. The active items also make it a bit weird. But overall good game

The feature that can put its game bigger than mobile legends is skills matchmaking. Skills matchmaking is something that should definitely be in a moba game. I would love to see this feature be added next update in order to make others assure that they have teammates that are equal to their battlefield skills. Game is overall the best and I repeat the best moba gaming company in over 10 years. (Quote me if you want) it‚Äôs my words. Keep it up.üëç
review_title: It can improve with one small feature

review: I love the game so far and progression has been going well. For me, it felt much more smooth and easy to use since I also used play other MOBAs in the past. Some criticism that I have about the game is the actually loading into the game. Every so often I get bugged out stating that I failed to connect to the game even when I am on a secure connection and I tried every method to log back into the game. In the end it doesn‚Äôt work out so if possible I would love for that to be patched up! Awesome game overall!

I have been playing league for many years now I‚Äôm still in love with the game and this is just an amazing format but I was playing with my husband and my game crashed I tried to login and it worked I actually managed to get back in the game I buy an item and I crashed again I waited for it to load and it didn‚Äôt and said I needed to update the game I did , also the game would not let me join so i waited for my husband to finish the game and I got banned for 20 min

So this is by far the best 5v5 MOBA on the phone.

1. Your not bombarded by things to buy every time you log in. Mobile Legends was really bad about that. 

2. They give tons of free heroes from the start (by level 10 I had over 20 heroes and spent 0 dollars)

3. The attention to detail is amazing and graphics far surpass Mobile Legends. 

4. Game play is very smooth and they have extra tutorials that you can do for extra rewards & a better understanding of in game mechanics. 

5. I can‚Äôt speak for other languages but, this game is perfectly written and spoken in English. Most of the 5v5 MOBA‚Äôs struggle to write in the English language but, LOL does it very well. 

So I have uninstalled Mobile Legends and don‚Äôt plan on going back. Good job to everyone that worked on this game. Your efforts have not gone unnoticed.

One thing this game needs improvement on is the ranking system when they match u up with others it does not make sense if I‚Äôm a platinum 4 going up against emerald 2 and 1 players and my whole team is emerald. This is a serious issue it isn‚Äôt fair for the person that trying to rank up but gets put on a team where players play like bronze and they are considered emerald, it‚Äôs a big joke when I‚Äôm carrying the team even tho I‚Äôm platinum 4

The game has amazing dynamics and it‚Äôs very entertaining, but it‚Äôs too much devil, you spend 40 minutes in a game, at what cost? Stress because it‚Äôs a very competitive game and it‚Äôs not fun if you r not winning and all depends on your team, which sometime is frustrating and it‚Äôs just not worth spending 40 minutes playing with teammates that only care about their own game and performance and not about the team‚Äôs performance, not happy you try another game, and then another one, and then another one until you find out it‚Äôs a an evil game. Stay away from this.

to be honest the game is good they just missing better champion with older spell from the first LOL like gangplanks ability sejani ult and other champion that spell has been removed I think they should have a rank AARam where player pick there champions 5 vs 5 just wow arena don‚Äôt matter if they have 2 of the same champion on each side cause it‚Äôs still a random setup the game can be way different from PC league
review_title: classic wild rift would be good

review: I see a lot of reviews saying to ‚Äújust play PC league‚Äù when a lot of people are trying wild rift because they can‚Äôt or don‚Äôt want to play on pc. So yes, wild rift is a really good high quality game. It‚Äôs still a mobile game though, and I don‚Äôt really think a huge competitive aspect is necessary. Have some fun on the rift and be done when you‚Äôre done, it shouldn‚Äôt be a huge deal. And if you want to grind and climb, do that. Have fun, don‚Äôt feel pushed to reach the top rank. But that‚Äôs just my cup ‚Äòo tea.

The match system is still really bad, you expect to see pro player in diamond or emerald but what you see are players who play like they have no idea how to play‚Ä¶ like come on dude‚Ä¶ how are you in diamond with a skill of bronze‚Ä¶. Like its always the enemy teams that knows what they are doing and
Performing better while your team is completely bronze skills with a diamond badge,

if you compare it to mobile legend, majority of the mythic players actually knows what they are doing, only once in a while you meet bad players who don‚Äôt know what they are doing, but if you get autofil support in league of legends, its  like the worse thing can happen.

review:
I‚Äôve been in more than one matchmaking where I‚Äôm paired with 4 silvers and a bronze as a gold.. you can‚Äôt win when half your team decides to feed. Or being paired in a game where everyone is 0-4 and afkers. Punish the people who leave the game. The game itself is a great and fun game. But the matchmaking really makes it not fun at all.

Edit:  I‚Äôve really loved playing aram and decided to play ranked again with the cool skin rewards that are offered!  

I‚Äôm actually quite pleased that they have upped their algorithm to pair better.  I do at times get paired with weaker ranked players but there is at least a note that they have been playing well.  In some cases the lower ranked actually plays better than the ones in my tier level.

Thanks for listening Riot.

review: Awesome game and very well put together. If you love to play League this is an awesome mobile version. Honestly I‚Äôve prob played more on mobile than pc as of lately, it‚Äôs just that much fun. Game speed is great and you do not lose the feel of overall game play. Also you can tell the developers are constantly updating and actually care about what is being released. Thumbs up for me !

I want to preface my review by saying that the coding and design are all solid and is very pleasing to the eye but playing the game itself often gets me upset due to the matchmaking where every other game there will be at least one instance of someone inting and taxing the rest of the team. Also the wait times on the ranked queue is insanely long where I on my first time I waited 20+ minutes before giving up and just playing ARAM. Riot please address this issue.

the reason why I rated a 5 star is because it‚Äôs a pretty fun and good game compared to the trash game mobile legends that literally copied everything, yes everything, the skills, the modes, anything you can think of. Wild rift‚Äôs skins are cheap and affordable, I spent over $300 on mobile legends because their skins are so dang expensive and not worth it. Wild rift is a good game for more advanced players, which makes the game good and shows real skill

Hello! I‚Äôve loved and been addicted to playing wild rift. I‚Äôve never been a huge fan of league of legend but the quality and excitement I get when I play Wild Rift is incredible. I started with casuals and now I‚Äôve been grinding Ranked. Unfortunately now my buttons are becoming unresponsive and I‚Äôve seen this was a problem addressed by others in Reddit. I really hope the unresponsive buttons and smoother button movement enhances in the upcoming update.
review_title: Been addicted to the game since I found it but..

review: So far this is my favorite game on mobile and this is going to be a short review. I love the way you team up and fight to uphold your side and attack the enemies side by taking turrets down, slaying minions, and champions but I have one problem, no matter how much money I spend it bans me left and right. I would love to have this changed and get an ai in your place if you are AFK. Even though this is not an AFK idle arena.
review_title: Banned ten seconds then banned an hour

review: I played a lot of the original game a few years back and was glad it was going mobile. it was getting tough to dedicate time to the game as time went on. Anyways I know games will have issues at their start so I‚Äôm not mad but I do have concerns there‚Äôs been a lot of loading issues matches won‚Äôt start or it‚Äôll have connection issues when I‚Äôm at full bars, and it‚Äôs been making the game unplayable and worst of all I‚Äôm getting penalized for it. So I just hope it gets fixed down the line

Please add tap controls. I play league on pc for 10 years now and have played Vainglory since release, joystick controls with AA button is just too clunky. Not enough precision in joystick controls. Just add an option to play on tap controls, let the casuals play on joystick and let those of us who want tap controls be able to play on them with a simple option button. Would make the game a lot more fun of an experience. Until then I can‚Äôt rate the game any higher, graphics are nice and a lot of champions imported from league, but the gameplay is just too clunky.

The graphics and control are amazing, I just hope for the upcoming updates that there is an automatic languages translation. Half of the time I am playing with other international players and I do not know what the heck they are saying. I am assuming that they are yelling at me to tell me to ‚ÄúRetreat, Retreat‚Ä¶ and all of a sudden I became the team Newbies.‚Äù Frustrated not knowing what your team trying to communicate with you. I just thought retreat meant engaging, so I did and die in a horrible death.

I LOVE this game. I play with my friends all the time, the graphics are stunning, and I‚Äôm always immersed in the gameplay, but I was hoping it had controller support.

I was testing it with my Backbone controller and didn‚Äôt connect so I did research and now I know why. I get the mobile touch experience but for gamers like me who prefer controller, this would extend the opportunity for more players to join - just my opinion.

There is a way for players to exploit functions, for a while i thought people had anti fog of war cheats. Whereas, i think it's when someone has their friend spectate a ranked match, they speak in discord, and then the person spectating can tell the other 5 players where enemies are hiding, how much HP bosses have left, that's because they have a setting to turn off fog of war for spectators. Please fix this, and ill give you a 5 star ranking, im tired of cheaters not getting reported, there I found where the leak is.. do something about it.. your welcome. free quality assurance.. from a professional.

Don‚Äôt get me wrong this is an entire different animal than the PC version. I will say if you are new to LoL I would start here. Things are simplified a bit and the tutorials are much clearer. This has a lot less content than the PC version and I believe it shows in a positive light. The fit and finish feels amazing and honestly makes the PC LoL show its age. (Maybe PC LoL will get a large overhaul in terms of style and accessibility.)
review_title: Feels more polished than PC LoL.

review: If you can use WiFi and your mobile service it only lags half the time. If you‚Äôre on an iPad that only has WiFi just don‚Äôt download it. Even on the lowest setting the lag will stop your champ from walking 5 or 6 times from base to lane. You‚Äôd think with all the similar games this type lag wouldn‚Äôt be an issue but apparently riot can‚Äôt get their game to work. What a waist

review: Been playing for a week or two and it‚Äôs a nice moba but at least once every other day when entering a match I loose connection to the match but every time it happens it‚Äôs during the loading into the map phase and no matter what I do I can not reconnect. This has happened on 2 different phones different accounts and on both phones I deleted and reinstalled nothing helps . This also happens in rank games so I‚Äôm hoping I won‚Äôt get banned from games because of this .

I love league of legends I‚Äôve only started playing recently however I have a very busy schedule. I go to nursing school and have work so I don‚Äôt have time to play normal league games which normally last about 40 mins. However wildrift games last less time and since it‚Äôs on the phone I can play a round on my breaks. It‚Äôs very fun it‚Äôs not as good as normal league however like previously mentioned I unfortunately don‚Äôt have much time to play anymore

The whole prospect behind mobile games is convenience and it‚Äôs pretty inconvenient if I‚Äôm going to be punished for having a life. What I mean is I‚Äôm not going to be able to finish 100% of the match‚Äôs I start simply because I‚Äôm ‚Äúon the go‚Äù I‚Äôm out and about and your going to impede my mobile gaming with afk penalties I get it it‚Äôs important on the pc version I finish approximately 99% of the matches I start on pc but due to the nature of mobile games in and of themselves this is an unrealistic expectation on the part of riot and I‚Äôll change my rating to 5 stars when this is toned down

I uninstalled yesterday because I was about 20 marks in master, mind you this is my 3rd time in master for 3 consecutive seasons and every time I get remotely lose to GM I get the absolute worst players on my team and the enemy team is just leagues better than mine, there has to be a better way to match players that put more time and effort into ranking than the casuals who refuse to play PvP, use KDA put people on teams and put them together, just rank status isn‚Äôt enough anymore, I like the game and I want to play, but I‚Äôm not sacrificing my mental and time for this sub par experience

I love how it all has been set up, compared to mobile legends you guys are definitely the goats. Pc does have more to offer. However seeing how Wild Rift teases ‚Äúnew champs‚Äù around every other update,(most of them being from the other platform) will surely give them time to catch up. I love watching LCS, both platforms behave so differently from each other it‚Äôs nice to see good competition at hand!

I love this game very much and all, it‚Äôs playable and it has nice skins too! But what doesn‚Äôt make sense is that to defeat Olenna you need the entire team and every single power ranger. Seriously I saw that she has two stages of defense yet she‚Äôll literally have your team dead in just 2 seconds. It‚Äôs kinda unfun to go against her imo, I‚Äôm not saying she needs a nerf (totally am) but please explain how she is this OP.
review_title: Olenna can beat the entire team and power rangers

review: Games runs great when it does run but the app oftenly quits at the beginning of a match and will not allow me to launch the game again to reconnect, and I am then given afk penalties when I actively tried to get back into the game. I have reinstalled the app a few times and figure that my iPhone 8 just isn‚Äôt good enough to run the game I suppose
review_title: App quits mid match and won‚Äôt re-open even after phone restart

review: I try to stick to support in multiplayer because of how bad I am at multiplayers and how much I love the class, idk out of all games that have new player or bad players this game by far is the most toxic to new or inexperienced players, I find it more often then not draining because of the messages people have, if not leaving or staying afk at home . Other than that the game is beautiful balancing isn‚Äôt bad but also is far from great, and character variety is astonishing , you‚Äôll never get bored. Tl;dr for good players not people who can‚Äôt play
review_title: Beautiful game overshadowed by toxic and power curb hungry player base

review:
Major quality of life changes allow you to play faster and more fluid without the hindrance of mouse and keyboard. This goes to show the advancement of game control is with the power of your hands. 

There are some balance issues and the need of preferred position queue but otherwise leaps and bounds a step up from the client version. This is truly the future of league of legends.

The only issue so far is that it does the thing where I‚Äôm unable to get into a match, and I‚Äôm forced to cancel the process. Doing so logs me out automatically, and I have to log back in all over again. 

Today, however, it took a step further, and decided to continuously try to get me back into the match I failed to get into, and every time I hit ‚ÄúCancel‚Äù, it kept on logging me out - an unjust punishment for a crime I was forced to commit. 

Please rectify this issue soon. Many thanks.
review_title: Great game - with one small issue

review: Please fix your game. Using iPhone 11 and whether I‚Äôm connected to WiFi or cellular data, your game works fine in lobby, zero issues, and as soon as I load a match I get in maybe 25% of the time or it never allows me to connect which incurs a temporary ban that is your fault entirely. Very discouraging to play a game that I‚Äôm going to get banned from when I have nothing to do with the issue. Only app I have with this issue. Will consider changing rating when problem is resolved, game is fun when you can actually get into a match.

I think the matchmaking system needs some work especially ranked as someone trying to push it‚Äôs gets very difficult when my enemies  are 2-3 ranks ahead of my and my team or when my team is 2-3 ranks below me. I hate how sometimes my team will be filled with gold and players when I‚Äôm pushing from emerald to diamond or when my opponents will be diamonds and my team can‚Äôt keep up. The ranked matchmaking needs to change.
review_title: Great game but needs some work

review: Game works great until you factor in the the nature of MOBAS. Atrocious match making inevitably prepares you for nothing but disappointment and headache. Immature and unsportsmanlike behavior goes unpunished way too easily. Egotistical brats need to be weeded from this game because when they don‚Äôt get their way, they sabotage there teammates game and soil the experience. This behavior needs to be deterred with stricter regulations. Been playing a since S1 and am pretty fed up with how bad it has gotten. You‚Äôre lucky to get one game without a single player throwing. This plagues every ranking and makes the system meaningless. If you want to not enjoy a game this is the one for you

Hello, first, I have been playing this game since it first published in app store. But after several updates, I saw that the matching algorithm is not base on the favorite position anymore which very discouraged me to play other positions that I am really bad with or dont have the drive to play those positions. I don‚Äôt mind the wait time so if there is an option to lock in the position will be good. Statistically, when I don‚Äôt play my favorite position, I just don‚Äôt want to play anymore
review_title: Overall is good but need adjustment for rank matching

review: There is something wrong with the matching mechanism, so it's hard to score. It's not that we are inactive, it's that your mechanism is hard to make people active. Heroes have many skins, and not many people will stay and play. Most people want to have the experience of scoring, and they don't feel like losing all the time, so it's hard to keep players' hearts and hope that they will do better and better in the future.

Whatever it is that you‚Äôve done to your algorithm in the interest of ‚Äúbalanced gameplay‚Äù is actually just a garbage system that prevents most players from enjoying the game.  Two or three players out of every match are stuck babysitting players that have no business even being in the same rank. In every rank it‚Äôs like this.  Why not have players just matched with equal skill leveled players so the bad players play with bad and good with good. Wish washy win one match lose three because of feeds and afks

I‚Äôve played league since season 4 on PC and played until season 12, maybe I wasn‚Äôt as skilled but honestly I perform and prefer the IOS version much better. It‚Äôs far more balanced and competitive. This is as close as you can get to PC quality. No cap. It‚Äôs not pay to win at all. It‚Äôs purely skilled based and riot already makes enough where TFT and rift are irrelevant.
review_title: As close and competitive as it gets for iOS

review: This is an awesome game I would spend money on if the deserters ban was a little more chill... I don‚Äôt want to lose my account or be ‚Äúpunished‚Äù for receiving a phone call or having an urgent need to use my phone... games are meant to be fun and played in your free time and with this being a mobile game and our phones are sort of an important usable machine we need for far more important things at times.. I‚Äôd hope the developers would be a bit more realistic...

Worst matchmaker in history. Ranked will put you against bots and with bots on your own team. You can only surrender after 5 minutes if ALL people surrender and because RIOT games deserves to be sued for all their money, they constantly put you with far far FAR inferior teammates that always quit. Lag out. Or it‚Äôs literally a bot. I cannot stress how much we need to create a class action lawsuit against riot for saying they have a Skill Based Matchmaker when they CLEARLY do not. Wish I could give 0 stars. Genuinely hope all the people responsible for the online matchmaker take a nice long toaster bath. You‚Äôre worthless.
review_title: Class action lawsuit against riot please

review:
The game freezes when you‚Äôre offered a match you can‚Äôt accept it but because you don‚Äôt you get penalized and have to acknowledge in a heavy handed way you let other people down when it‚Äôs their app that let people down. Besides the fact it‚Äôs been weeks since it happened before one other time but I‚Äôm a repeat offender now. This is a mobile game, I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs right to be so quick with the punishment for this.

It just did it again a minute later and now I‚Äôm locked out for even longer when it‚Äôs your fault

review: I've played Mobile Legends before but as soon as Wild Rift got its Beta, I bid my farewell to ML and Wild Rift didn't disappoint me. The champions are fun to play, the graphics is superb, the skins are affordable and classy, the animations are just top-notch. I'm satisfied to a certain extent, the only downside would be matchmaking system. It takes so long just to find a Silver rank match and also I get matched with people from Emerald. Honestly, Riot could do better.

Game is fun at first but when you get into high elo it‚Äôs completely boring and unbalanced. I‚Äôm master on two accounts and it‚Äôs just the same champions being played over and over again. Meta is boring, just play garen and build all defensive items but still one shot all ADC champs with your ult Bc riot is very good at balancing the game and listening to the players. Also no ban system so you can always expect to see garen played Bc there is no way to stop it. I‚Äôd wait to invest time until they do some serious changes to the game Bc as of right now it‚Äôs the same old meta over and over again.

If you win a lot, the matchmaking won't give you better teammates and have higher  quality games. Instead your q time will just increase to 5 minutes while they look for 4 players who have literally never played before. Also, God Forbid, you want to play with a friend. Just know that if you want to enjoy a game with a friend, Riot's matchmaking will now assume that because you are playing with a friend, that means you 2 will immediately become lcs players so therefore they must put you up against significantly stronger players. It's like riot doesn't want people to have friends. Just don't play this game.
developerResponse: {'id': 22545005, 'body': "Hi Player,\n\nThat sounds like something we might be able to help you with! Send us a ticket at https://support-wildrift.riotgames.com/ and we'll try to get you back on track.", 'modified': '2021-04-30T04:10:11Z'}

review:
Aside from the game flipping the entire ‚Äúscreen‚Äù to basically replicate BOT lane evenly 
for both teams it‚Äôs pretty good Champs have style a little more so than actual league which I wished they would transfer the animations over for the Pick screens but other than those complaints I‚Äôm content and hopefully they listen to the fans on both platforms and keep it updated for years to come. Simply enjoyable.
review_title: If you play League you already know

review:
This is incredible as someone who has played league since season 2. The amount of effort that went into keeping the core of LoL alive while simultaneously making the game much more mobile friendly is impressive.

Riot gives you so many champs/skins for free to start and if you played the game before it gives even more. I really enjoy that they‚Äôre giving a ton of freebies and not doing a cash grab. Stoked on this game and excited to play more.

Match making is the biggest flaw of this game. I had to delete it after years of playing as it gets so frustrating. You can go 10+ games without getting a decent team. Almost every game you will get someone who either intentionally feeds or leaves the game and there is nothing you can do about it. You can report players but 9/10 times nothing happens when you report someone. This game has serious issues and while it can be fun, more often than not you‚Äôll find yourself on a losing streak because of the horrible match making system.

I was in a ranked game playing adc and my support lock in grave and bring smite. During the entire game he tried to take all the cs, red buff from me and he int multiple times during laning phase. In the end of the game he went 1/8/0, so I reported him. I was expecting some penalties right? Two days later, I was curious so I look at his match history and he played nearly 20 games within this two days. Nothing happened to him. I was a plat 1 veteran and I‚Äôm stuck at gold/silver because of players like these. RIOT doesn‚Äôt even take ranked serious anymore. I‚Äôm slowly losing my passion into this game and Im very disappointed to RIOT.
review_title: Riot doesn‚Äôt look at our REPORT
developerResponse: {'id': 36776560, 'body': 'Please reach out to us with a ticket at https://support-wildrift.riotgames.com/ and we can figure out what happened!', 'modified': '2023-05-28T16:07:24Z'}

review: Where do I even begin? Oh boy, there are heaps of issues, causing this game to not compete with ML and others. It‚Äôs so broken that you can‚Äôt add or delete people, you can‚Äôt transfer friends or communicate with LOL players, and the worst of all‚Ä¶ not being able to delete a LOL player from your friends list and re-add them. It‚Äôs a joke, it‚Äôs miserable, it‚Äôs buggy, glitchy, and everything else you can possibly imagine. The ranking system: the worst I've seen to date. Overall, a terrible experience and one that I will never repeat. Thanks for ruining my gameplay and account, Wild Rift. Get your act together.
review_title: The most broken game in existence.

review: I rarely play League of Legends on the PC anymore because Wildrift satisfies me. The game controls are surprisingly easy and an upgrade over keyboard play. Also the gameplay is FASTER which makes it feel more exciting and tactical. New champions and game upgrades are released often which makes things that much more fun. It‚Äôs my number 1 mobile game‚Ä¶possibly of all time.
review_title: Preferred over League of Legends on PC

review: I mean where to begin, Wild Rift is the epitome of everything wrong with gaming. The matchmaking system is horrendous, doesn‚Äôt matter if you get high elo you‚Äôll still be matched with people who underperform every single game. Let‚Äôs not even talk about the punishment system they have in place. There‚Äôs no consequences in this game when it comes to griefing, you might get a 12 hour chat lock for being toxic but that‚Äôs about it. You won‚Äôt get your account compromised for being toxic and trolling. So if you‚Äôre into have negative experience, trolling players, horrendous matchmaking system and etc this game might be for you.

If you go afk nothing happens. The reporting system only punishes people who say mean things but if afk or play an assigned role. Have no fear you can just lad in and trash another ranked game. Would love to rank with my friends but if you don‚Äôt have a full team your odds of having a troll on your team are significant. Maybe they should worry less about bring champions and more on fixing the reporting and the ranking que‚Ä¶ Most would wait longer times and get a position they know. Shouldn‚Äôt force someone to potentially play a position in a ranked match that they don‚Äôt know. I will not be purchasing or playing until progress is made

Awesome game, I always have fun with it and the diversity of champions is excellent. Graphics are awesome and gameplay great. Only 2 issues,  when playing rank there is always that one player that feeds or trolls for fun and reprimands are never severe enough. If punishment and potential banning were present for those acts I would give 5. Not only that but then having half team in low ranks while you in emerald or platinum is not great having to carry for multiple games in a row.

This is a great game for every person, and it makes you feel good when you win. It is a really good way to test your skills and to show them off. It‚Äôs a great game for all. It may be a bit hard at first but hey it‚Äôs fun after that so download it and you may play with friends family or friends online and if your friends are new show them how to play and get on the rift.
review_title: Just get the game it is awesome.

review: This game has the worst matchmaking in history of all games. Instead of evenly distributing players, you would go on win streaks and losing streaks. Sometimes no matter how well you‚Äôre playing, you‚Äôre matched against someone who‚Äôs way higher ranked and you get matched with teammates who are way below your rank. I am a plat 1-2 player and why do I get matched with gold 4 players in certain match? This doesn‚Äôt make any sense that sometimes there‚Äôll be emerald 1 player in my match as well. They have all the money in the world and they can‚Äôt get the matchmaking right. Makes the game incredibly frustrating to play.
developerResponse: {'id': 23893607, 'body': "That doesn't sound right‚Ä¶ We suggest submitting a support ticket at https://support-wildrift.riotgames.com/\nto get in touch with our Player Support Team. They'll make sure your problem is heard and do what they can to address it!", 'modified': '2021-07-13T03:13:26Z'}

review:
Wild Rift is an accelerated, mobile version of League of Legends on the phone. It does a great job porting over the same content. I like playing it because the games are quick and the team fighting is fun.

There are some drawbacks to playing on the phone, sometimes the controls aren‚Äôt quite receptive and it‚Äôs quite difficult to control the auto attacking and abilities. Camera is a little difficult to position too, panning and keeping vision on the map isn‚Äôt easy to do.

As for connections, I have been running into connection issues quite often when playing even on my home WIFI. The ping will spike and often times I‚Äôll lag out during team fights, etc.

Also ran into this issue where I was playing ARAM and suddenly the application logged me out saying there was an account error. Afterwards I couldn‚Äôt log in and the sign in would time out.
review_title: Fun game though some features need work. Also ran into connection issues on the phone

review: Not sure what happened 3 weeks ago, but gameplay significantly decreased.  Every game I play I get paired up with people that seem like bots on easy mode and the enemy team is diamond or something.  I just got SVP with 5 kills/9 deaths/2 assists. Our team had 14 kills the enemy had 45‚Ä¶.  I‚Äôm ok with this happening every now and then but almost every game.  I love this game and tried to continue but I just can‚Äôt.  Don‚Äôt know what happened in the last 3 weeks, but that was my last game.  I‚Äôm done.  Hopefully this experience doesn‚Äôt happen to you.

It‚Äôs so annoying that you can‚Äôt play in other regions cause of high ping. mobile vpns don‚Äôt have a stable connection and may increase your ping. but in PC ver you can just use an IP jumper easily without much change in ping. I think you should reconsider banning some regions to be able to play this game. Players live everywhere in the world and they should not be banned to play because of where they are. I‚Äôm a regular player in PC version both lol and tft and I enjoy it. but in mobile it‚Äôs not that easy to play and I can‚Äôt enjoy playing lol.
review_title: high ping while playing in other regions

review:
I had a lot of criticisms of this game when I first started playing. Since then, the game has steadily and dramatically improved. I stopped playing league and only play wild rift now. 

I strongly wish that wild rift would support split screen mode so that I can do other things while in queue. That would make the experience significantly smoother and make it easier to play wild rift more regularly.

They'll make sure your problem is heard and do what they can to address it!", 'modified': '2021-09-20T13:41:07Z'}

review:
I saw few of the reviews with one start and they contradict each other, at least give a proper review‚Ä¶

Examples: some say that there‚Äôs much hate speech on chat and they don‚Äôt do much enough but other said he was banned for a day for hate speech.

Other is about matchmaking they said is awful, but other said he was banned for 14days as his team ganged on him(I‚Äôm pretty sure he didn‚Äôt play wellü§£üòÇ).

The match making system is broken. It‚Äôs very hit or miss if my teammates are even close to my skill level. A few suggestions, whomever get SVP on the losing team shouldn‚Äôt lose any points as a reward because right now it‚Äôs like ‚Äúyou were the best player on your team, but you are being punished anyway‚Äù. Also, you should consider ranking up based on role assignment. Someone that climbs the ranks as support will most likely cause the team to lose if he has to jungle in emerald or platinum

Matchmaking is barely decent, hard stuck gold because I keep getting silvers and sometimes unranked players like how? The game is great overall, good connection, great graphics and controls. But main problem is matchmaking, would be better if you guys sent a mail for certain reports so they avoid doing them and if done a reported second time for the same thing a ban for certain time period. Hope the game flourish on mobile.

I love the game been playing for a while and I can say it‚Äôs a work of art as I have it in my pc. And hands down it makes up for every bit that I‚Äôm not able to play at home the graphics the champions the attention to detail is just amazing. I love it as a on the go for summoners rift. Riot killed it making it for mobile can‚Äôt wait to see how much more they can make out of it üíØüòå

As a long time PC player, the transition was almost seamless. Many champions slightly redesigned to work better with touch controls. Graphically better than the PC since this uses Unreal Engine with all new character models and effects.

It‚Äôs a great pass time and even though it has it‚Äôs matchmaking and champion pool issues; it is the best MOBA on mobile and for a long time will be. Great work riot.

I‚Äôve waited so long for them to make league of legends on mobile, I‚Äôve been saying for years they need to do it. I am also glad it‚Äôs a bit more simplified than the pc version, I don‚Äôt want to spend hours making rune builds and stuff with all the complicated stuff they have on PC version. I love this game and I‚Äôm so glad it‚Äôs on mobile, I was getting sick of playing Mobile Legends.
review_title: So Glad LoL Is Mobile Now!

review: I‚Äôve reached a mythic in mlbb and transferred over and I have sunken a great amount into it but the more I play it the more the meta chunks into the gameplay. As of now wild rift is more balanced esp with its smaller champ pool. I understand the game is unlike the original and I treat the games as a separate game rather than base my judgement off their relation to one another but I do compare it to mlbb due to their relation as a mobile moba with similar mechanics
review_title: Best Moba for the time being

review:
Currently Platinum 1 and has play more than 250 games. Only problem is there no way you know that foul player get punishment or not. And, there tons of troll/ toxic ( especially MOBA games). Comparing other competitors games, which I am top 0.1% tier rank,( i.e Mobile legend), you will know others punishment if there substantial report per match ( many players report in a game). Overall, I rather choose to play Mobile legends since it has been less troll/ toxic due to fair punishments. 
Graphic: Good
Animation: Good
Environment: Bad 
Battery consumption: a lot than other games

Amazing game. Feels smooth. Addicting. Great with friends. HOWEVER, this game is plagued with sore losers and that if someone goes AFK, YOU HAVE LIKE A 99% chance you will lose. People go afk all the time. Like 10-15% of the matches. REMOVE THESE PLAYERS. Ban them from rank. Let them play pvp or aram. How is this hard to do? Make these people pay. They do have report system, but doesn‚Äôt really see anyone getting banned. 
Lots of time I stopped playing because of this. Please fix!!
review_title: AFK users are killing the game!!!

review: I downloaded and started playing this game while I was visiting Thailand, so the game automatically put me on the Asia server. I made good progress and bought a few skins, everything was fine. I return to my home country, and tried to log into the game, but the log in screen doesn‚Äôt let me, saying my current location doesn‚Äôt match the server of my account. I basically can‚Äôt play the game anymore because my account was on the Asia server. The customer service team said they can‚Äôt do anything. Wasted money and time for a game I can‚Äôt even play anymore. I want my refund.
review_title: DON‚ÄôT PLAY THIS GAME if you are traveling

review: Okay I have played other MOBA‚Äôs and this one is by far the best.  I also have watched Arcane on Netflix so now I love it even more because I like the characters.  Ignore the negative reviews, there are not major bugs in the game‚Ä¶I have played this game for a year now and have had no issues whatsoever.  The gameplay is fun, graphics are beautiful and the different ways to play is great.
review_title: Ignore negative reviews!!!  A must have MOBA

review: I have been playing league of legends for almost 10 years now, and i cant believe how badly i still want to hurt myself every time i log in to play a game. If you are looking for a toxic, life sucking, sweaty community to play an online MOBA with, this is your game! If you never want to see grass again, this is your game! I am flabbergasted by the skill required (mashing your skull across your screen) to get a kill in this game! You will always guaranteed get the NPC bot vibe people on your team, and SKT T1 will always be on the other! GG and good luck, thanks RITO!

Wild Rift all around is better than the PC version atm. Where PC league is feeling more of a mobile game and wild rift is feeling like an official game. The UI in wild rift is way better than PC, the skins and intro animations are amazing! Que times are the same as PC, and you don‚Äôt have to waste 20-40 minutes of your life if you have trolls. One thing I‚Äôd try to add is allowing users to use wireless keyboards and mouses!

I loved playing this game while I could but something with this recent update made it to where I can‚Äôt open it anymore, I‚Äôve deleted and reinstalled it aswell as I deleted a lot of older apps I no longer use, I even restarted my phone multiple times I don‚Äôt know what the issue is, but if your able to download the game and play it, it‚Äôs really awesome hopefully they‚Äôll do some bug fixes soon so I can to
review_title: Awesome game but has some issues

review: One of the best looking games I have played on mobile. The graphics are beautiful! However the absolute deal breaker is that there is no controller support. I refuse to play a game of this caliber on the touchscreen of my iPhone as it‚Äôs too clunky and difficult to enjoy. More time is spent trying to focus on the controls or adjust my hand position than the actual game play and this is a very poor user experience.  If this game is ever updated to support a controller I would happily re-download it and update my review.  Until then I will play one of the many other games that have proper controller support.
review_title: No controller support is a deal breaker.
developerResponse: {'id': 27776581, 'body': "Hi Omg Bobby,\n\nThat sounds like something we might be able to help you with! Send us a ticket at https://support-wildrift.riotgames.com/ and we'll try to get you back on track.", 'modified': '2022-02-01T04:13:54Z'}

review: I was always a casual fan of the PC version, so having mobile version really fit that sweet spot for me. I mainly game on tablet and this is definitely in my favorite mobile game. Very solid. My only complaint is it doesn‚Äôt have as much content as the PC version but growing with it over time is pretty cool too. Hope to see controller support when console version comes out.

I use to play league back in the day but I don‚Äôt have a working PC anymore. I‚Äôm glad I can now play the real thing and not some knock off. I like that I was able to jump right in even though it‚Äôs been years since I played LoL. Fizz was one of the first champs I bought and plays exactly how I remembered. You get a good number of champions as you play and level up too. Try it out.

I enjoyed playing league in my laptop until I recently fell on not having adequate space or funds to set up a desktop computer. This is the best solution to the pc version. They games are scaled down a bit but the same fun and excitement still remains! Also the time one usually takes is relatively shorter than an average league game.
review_title: Perfect mobile version of pc version

review: Great game the best mobile one so far. My only complaint is the duration of afk and abandoned games ban. It is way too harsh for a mobile game. I could be in an emergency situation and need to use my phone to call authorities on a public train for example and need to leave my game to do so. So the game will punish you. There are times where you have to put your phone down whatever that reason is it shouldn‚Äôt be punished with and hr+ ban. It‚Äôs far too harsh.

It‚Äôs a great game, but I think it would be a lot better if aram was a permanent mode. I liked how the games were not as tedious as pvp, and how it was harder for ppl to not contribute to team fights. Also I feel like more events should include skins, so ppl that can‚Äôt afford them could have a chance of getting them. Besides these things, I absolutely love this game and how they‚Äôre giving the money of the sentinel event to charity

I‚Äôve always loved this game type but hated the toxic player base that came with it.  I hated it enough I never played many MOBAs.  This is the first one where I‚Äôve felt like I can be a beginner and it‚Äôs ok.  

My biggest complaint - and this is the only reason it loses a star - is what a nightmare matchmaking can be.  You either get a match or you sit in queue forEVER.  I‚Äôll go days without playing because the matchmaking is so terrible I literally can‚Äôt connect

I really liked this game but it‚Äôs very hard for beginners.
