Title, in every regard. As a veteran from the genre‚Äôs inception, I‚Äôm not only surprised, but very much satisfied. Bring this to Nintendo, please, and I‚Äôll drop the big bucks; until then I‚Äôm more than happy to pick up a skin for my iPhone (11) career. 

Been playing since release today and I‚Äôm surprised how battery optimized this is. I‚Äôm only writing now that I have to charge. 

Will update in a month, but the team has made a genuinely strong first impression. üëèüèº

I‚Äôm an avid league player, and done a touch of Mobile Legends and AoV and the entire gauntlet of mobile games. Wild Rift was looking very up for its release, and then... nothing.

The game itself lacks a lot of the momentum I like from league of legends. Everything feels rather low stake and low impact. You don‚Äôt really feel the lead you get from playing well like in Mobile Legends, nor do you feel the sense of coordination and outplay you get from PC League. Everything feels mediocre.

Item customization honestly needs to be more flavorful. I strolled up the game and thought about changing the build, but then realized that there was nothing else I rather have than the 6 items on the recommended part. There‚Äôs no variety. Rune pages are alright, I guess, but I wonder if they needed to simplify it so much.

Overall, not a terrible game. Not great, not bad, but just an unbridled meh.

Been on this game since it first came out, I believe this is one of the best games on App Store! Would it be possible to bring back the ‚Äúchat(all)‚Äù you guys removed it since last update and I feel like the chat brings a different experience on the game it makes it more fun and you meet the enemy side. We will behave ourself üò≠üôè love you guys awesome job ‚ù§Ô∏è I wish you everyone the best in life.

Pros:

Amazing graphics, more profile/gameplay/interface customization options, and overall less toxicity than LoL. In terms of gameplay, I prefer WR way more and like that there are frequent events. 

Cons:

Sometimes, I randomly lose control of my champ and they either won‚Äôt move, run in the opposite direction or auto lock on a target and run at them. So frustrating because it causes unnecessary deaths. PLEASE improve functionality, Riot! It tends to happen around patch releases. Ugh. 

Unless you want to spend $200 on a mythic skin or ~$60 on a mythic chroma, do not use the Hextech Loot system. It‚Äôs highway robbery. Why can you earn orange essence and keys on LoL but can only buy keys/gemstones on WR? Make it fair!! WR is a worse cash grab than League in general because there are less opportunities to earn in game currency/etc.
review_title: Good overall but needs some work

review: I‚Äôve been playing the game for 5 months sith about 700+ games, and a very notable pattern that I realized was that the game deliberately kept you on a losing streak after winning a few. I could win like 3 games and lost the next 7 games in a row (5 of which I‚Äôm the SVP). At first I thought it was due to random teammates being bad but after experiencing this so many times, I concluded that it was the game that tried to hamper my rate. I know this was something common on LoL PC as people are used to grinding, but tbh it‚Äôs much worse on here. Won‚Äôt return to the game until they fix this massive issue.
review_title: Game deliberately keeps your win rate at 50% or lower

Not sure what‚Äôs wrong but it‚Äôs pretty annoying. It‚Äôs actually happening rn and I‚Äôm most likely gonna get penalized for leaving the match or whatever. Hope it gets fixed üò©

It's not hard to admit I've downloaded this application several times. There are many flashing lights, loud sounds and inner application purchases. If you're ready to say "no" to your impulses to bandy words with the trolling players, to purchase needless items, and to spending too much time playing it, then you'll enjoy this game.

I love this game because it‚Äôs so well programmed and it‚Äôs very enjoyable and addicting. Team plays, skill plays, and everything else is wonderful. I have no clue what I‚Äôm doing other than standing and watching the game do all the work. It‚Äôs a visually pleasing game but I was hoping to be able to distinguish whom im attacking/being attacked by and defending myself. Chafing to get your team in order is quite hard as the chat fills with useless info like gold earned and such also it isn‚Äôt transparent and get in the way. Overall a good idel play game.

This game is like league of legends the desktop version but it is simplified. The games are short though they are too short for my taste. The items are extremely simplified where a lot of the ones that you activate are automatic. Though the main problem I have with the game is too strict on minor offenses and will let people who abuse the game many time will go Scott free. It is great experience and will constantly let you not have a good time because the community is terrible and won‚Äôt be fixed.

review:
I have played over 30 games in wild rift and there is an unbearable delay that destroys my favor for this game. It's not due to my wifi or internet speed because I check and even on the game screen, it shows that my ping is only 30 or 40.

The game is good but it gets delay very badly when a lot of champions get together. When I try to escape the battle or try to cast my skill, it literally take more than a second for the skills to appear or if I was escaping, my character would stand still and then dash forward. This is extremely annoying and destroy my experience with the game. Hope it gets fixed soon.

review: First off, this game is great and runs/fi toons smoothly.  I really enjoy it and the minor changes that were made to accommodate the mobile version.  The only issue I know myself and other players are having is every so often the game cannot connect.  It tries to reconnect, but it fails every time and you have to wait ~2min for it to reset.  I also got a leaver warning because of this.....when it‚Äôs a bug in the games coding.  If you fix this, the game is golden!

The characters are well developed and it‚Äôs fun to play BUT there are some serious issues that you should be aware of and has made me not want to play this game...First is the matching, every game I have played has always been 1 sided matches that you can tell whose going to win the match within 5 minutes (average game has lasted 16-23 min.) secondly their BANNED system is horrible!!! I play on my phone and sometimes the connection gets lost or wifi is too slow and I get kicked out but yet I‚Äôm penalized for it??? The developers need to really address this issue ASAP

review:
The game has you jumping into a game right away, and although I‚Äôve never played a MOBA on a phone before, everything felt just right. Each champion feels just like how they do in League. It‚Äôs the full League experience into a bite size and is more accessible and easier for people to get into.
Match lengths felt perfect. The UI and feel of polish coming from this game is incredible. Hats off, this was one massive project to pull off.

Easily the most polished mobile game available at the moment. Paid items are all cosmetic, controls are fantastic, gameplay is fluid, graphics are amazing and it even supports 120fps on iPad Pro. The people that rate anything but 5 stars are kidding themselves; this is the best mobile game to date and it set a new standard for quality of mobile games.

I used to really love this game when I first got it but now I‚Äôm always getting made fun of it people report me because I don‚Äôt play as good as a ranked person,I just downloaded the game to play enjoy and have fun but now it‚Äôs not that fun cuz I‚Äôm constantly getting reported or getting bullied in games because I‚Äôm not ranked or I don‚Äôt play to other peoples standards you really need to check out your ranked community because it‚Äôs always the ranked players that are rude to other players it‚Äôs also not fair to get reported just because someone doesn‚Äôt like you

At first, I was skeptical that this game would work well on mobile. But in reality, it just might be better! Abilities feel smooth, and picking which items will appear in your store automatically is a great way to speed up the item buying process. The only real trouble I‚Äôve had is recasting Camille‚Äôs grappling move. Overall great game, definitely worth downloading.

Perfect design and graphics etc.  Most 1-3 stars are from lol pc players who complain it‚Äôs not good enough. Wild rift needs money to stabilize the game and keep it on the App Store/google play and workers!!  So I really suggest you play it.

The game itself is a 5 star. The players however is just a 0. There are too many trolls, griefers, inters playing this game without punishment. Was expecting more about the report system since riot mentioned they would severely punish these types of players but I keep getting at least one in every 2 games. review: This game would be good if the Report System was even remotely viable for toxic individuals, but it‚Äôs not. But the second I decide to defend myself from the trash talk within the community guidelines, I get chat restricted/banned for at least 24 hours. As far as I am concerned, this type of nonsense only keeps the toxic people who don‚Äôt care in, and the decent players out of the this game. Until Riot fixes this issue, I am not gonna waste another minute on their product.

review:
The game itself is good. But it‚Äôs like being forced to play chess with idiots. Even if chess itself is a good game, playing with people who quit minutes into the game, people who intentionally troll, etc. imagine  there was a game of chess that was a team game. Each team member gets a move.  Now imagine one or two of your team members is intentions screwing up or just randomly leaves so a computer makes bad moves for him or you just lose your moves‚Ä¶.

That‚Äôs what this game is. A good mechanical game that fails due to internet connection or a terrible community. I will never play this game again.  Or at least I hope I won‚Äôt.

It's happened when I tried to use in-game purchase but the store is empty , I did a little research and found out it's probably the region of my riot account. So I submit those tickets on your website, over and over again. But no one actually look into the case and give me a solution that would work. Instead, just bunch of copy-and-paste reply by bot and employee every times. Telling me to contact the operator of my account current region. But you didn't authorize the operator to solve any problems related to riot account, a freakin dead end for me, and a disgrace of you

They made this game too easy to play. The auto aim mechanic just ruins the game. It ruins so much. You can‚Äôt make flash plays, mechanical outplays or anything because if you use your ability or flash too early their ability will follow you even when they didn‚Äôt mean to do that. It‚Äôs so stupid honestly. They made this game too easy just so they can have players. Game started going to the trash when they took all chat out. It‚Äôs more tilting trying to mechanically outplay your opponent just to get your play ruined by that TRASH mechanic. Game isn‚Äôt getting as much attention as it used to.
review_title: Game‚Äôs too easy LITERALLY makes it boring.

review: I really enjoy this game. I‚Äôm terrible at LoL and feel like Rift has helped me improve overall. I also find Rift much easier which allows me to actually contribute‚Ä¶ Unless I am autofilled in a role I didn‚Äôt select, which has happened multiple times in a row now. I would much rather sit in a longer que than be placed in a role I know nothing about or not prepared for which causes me to drag my team down and lose. It‚Äôs really not fun to feel and be the useless player because the game forces it on you. I‚Äôd give the game 5 stars if it weren‚Äôt for this aspect.

Big fan of this game, I‚Äôm a average player that‚Äôs is annoyed by the fact that people always goes afk, I have 8 matches lost in a row because they always go afk, rank matches are really hard  and at least the game should have some fair manage of the matches that u lost when the team go afk, people if you don‚Äôt have a team that barely know how to play and you can play with, you‚Äôll never get higher tiers with randoms, there‚Äôs no other way to explain the frustration of depending in people to get higher tiers and they go afk always,ü§°

I really appreciate the latest version of this game bc of the roles and lane are picked before a game. And every game isnt always the same. Different play styles different champions playing different roles is awesome to see and mindblowing possibilities.

Right now we report them and they get some sort of penalty which I‚Äôm not even sure what it is however if instead they were just lock the same character on the other team make it four and four at that time it would be much more fair to the people playing just lost 13 in a row because of AFK characters or toxic players that troll. Especially in ranked matches

Don‚Äôt see why Riot would add bots to the game when someone does not reconnect. Thing is, bots in the game just run in and dies over and over again and does not react to pings. At least make it possible where they can react to pings so they just don‚Äôt recklessly push solo lane and continue to die over and over. I love the game but this is the most flawed thing about it. It just makes the game harder to win and less fun to play. Thank you!
review_title: Great game but why add the bot system ?

review:
Love the game when played on a friends device but got on to check it out for myself and there is far too much data collected and it‚Äôs really unnecessary to collect that much data, AND it is clearly stated that it is sold to other companies.

For those that review that this is a ‚Äúbreath of fresh air‚Äù that it‚Äôs not pay to win or pay to play and doesn‚Äôt have ads, that comes at the cost of your private information.

review:
If you like 5v5 mobile games, you will definitely be in love with this. Ignore the haters, they are all PC gamers.

This game definitely sets the bar high for all 5v5 mobile games out there. So high quality and the attention to detail is fascinating, from  the organization to the consoles and tutorials, very impressive. Even training mood is amazing.

This game will be very popular among mobile games especially iOS.

The system let you continually win or lose by matching teams. I got SVPs 8 times, I believe my skill is not the reason of lose, suppose I am on the average level of my team and the opponent team each time, that the chance to work with stronger teammates is half. That is to say, the chance to win the game is half each time. So the chance to lose 8 times continually is (1/2)^8=1/256. Such a continually lose happens many times. How is that possible to happen without the system operation on matching. This game is not a fair one, but fools the players. You will be mad and get crazy to play this game!

review: This is what a free to play game should be.  No ads just obviously micro transactions which are all skins, emotes, or other profile items or icons.  Actually letting you play the game instead of bombarding you with ads is how this game goes about convincing you to buy the battle pass or a new skin.  No energy cool downs or anything.  Play as many games with your friends online as you want.  This is what mobile gaming should be.
review_title: The King of Free to Play

review: I‚Äôve been playing this game for a few months now, and it‚Äôs encouraged me to try League of Legends on the pc again. But Wild Rift is a lot easier for me to grasp and I‚Äôve been playing it all of the time. It‚Äôs my favorite mobile game, and I love that it‚Äôs not pay to win. Obviously no ads as well which is just another plus lol I‚Äôll forever be playing this game.

Played on PC and enjoyed it. I saw the game grow and change and become more toxic so I stopped playing for a few years. I saw recently they had the phone game and I downloaded it. Got all the way to ranked and about every 3 games it will ‚Äúfail to connect‚Äù and I have to wait 25 mins for a game to finish and it logs me in and out. Absolutely horrible experience. If expect this from a start up company but riot games cmon man. You are giving us a half working platform. Let‚Äôs push some updates and correct this.

I‚Äôve been playing League on PC for a couple years now, and to finally have a Mobile version is awesome! I really like the way it‚Äôs been adapted, I thought it‚Äôd be complicated but it‚Äôs actually pretty simple! 

Only downsides are 1) it‚Äôs kinda stupid that if you sign in with your Riot account it literally means nothing, skins don‚Äôt transfer and all that so it‚Äôs pretty pointless and 2) It‚Äôs like a new account, you have to start leveling up all over again :/

But overall, I love it!! Definitely recommended for any PC League gamers out there!!

The game is great when it works. Several times I have picked my champ and then loading screen comes and I get a message saying error has occurred. It gives me the option to reconnect or cancel. Reconnect tries again and still won‚Äôt connect. Cancel signs me out and when I sign back in I get the same message until the game ends. The game has some bugs. The gameplay and champions look great. I hope the connection issues get resolved quickly.

This game is amazing and I‚Äôm so glad it‚Äôs on mobile, but it would be 1000 times more enjoyable if it were controller compatible. That would be an amazing development a lot of people would use. Honestly I could see the game changing from free to be priced and controller supported or even to be featured on Apple Arcade. I hope you guys make this game controller compatible soon!

First let me start off by saying this is a good game for mobile. The two stars I put above was for the player base in this game. So many trolls that go unpunished in matches and it‚Äôs infuriating. I can‚Äôt peacefully climb without every other game having a teammate who wants to play pyke adc and feed the entire game. People get away with playing stupidly in this game because they don‚Äôt have to follow the rules. I feel Wild rift need better ways to punish trolls and people who ruin the game for other. Play this game with friend and don‚Äôt solo q if you want to maintain sanity.

I love this game the only reason I deleted is because I needed storage but now I‚Äôm hoping I enough enough storage to install it back. I love the unique character designs and how even though you can only choose one starter character, you can still get them all for free. I think this game is amazing and I absolutely would recommend it to other people!

I was a long time league pc player back in the day. Now years later with no time to pc gaming, I found this game looking for something to pass the time on my lunch breaks. Man, this game is so on point with the pc version. It makes me feel as if I never left. In my opinion it‚Äôs an amazing game for the phone and truly plays just as the pc does. Thank you for making this!

I was a long time LoL player  from maybe 2009 to 2013. I got a little burnt out on it toward the end, and the negativity got to be too much. 

In 2021 I started missing playing team games with my mains, and looked to see if the LoL mobile game I had heard rumors about was any good. 

I haven‚Äôt put it down since. I enjoy playing this much more than the last version. Matches are somewhat quicker, and chat negativity is way less (only because it‚Äôs hard to type on mobile‚Ä¶ but I started muting chat altogether just to make sure).

If you like MOBAs, LoL has always been the gold standard (sure DOTA is good, but for different reasons). WR is the best mobile moba in my opinion. I didn‚Äôt like AoV or ML nearly as much.

First off, losing streaks have to be fixed, I have played many games with people who have a higher skill level than me and with teammates who performed terribly, worse than my rank. Gold players do not play like gold nor do silver players. 

Second off is the wild pass. In my opinion, we should be able to earn a wild pass through ranked matches specifically and skins as well. This completely ruins the fun for free to play players who want to collect all the champions which will take much longer without the wild pass. 

These are the main issues I wish to see fixed for now.

The report system is missing some key things from the pc version.
When we report people we never get a notification  if the report worked.
We need a report system on profiles or replays of people. I have forgotten to report some people from time to time and then i cant report them.
Overall the game is fine champions expensive but is a good game.
Also more configurations would be great

) wild rift is really different than PC league of legend  
   1) Rank is not balance me(diamond3)and my friend(diamond1) sometime we play with emeral or even platinum in our team. Their skill very different than other enemy team so we lost because elo diff
      It always like 2 or 3 players who are 3rank lower than you, so they just feed really hard and don‚Äôt know what to do i have no idea what to do when im a diamond 3 had to play with supper dive rank elo 
2) voice chat in group party not really work seen that last 3 updated version until now. so it really hard to communicate with yourfriend in party
 3) It takes a supper long time to get into a game matching in team of 3 or team of 5 even you are lower than diamond 2. Last week my team of 3 diamond 3 had to wait 15mimute just to find a game 
4) People are now deleted this game because of troll, toxic, elo balanced, feed 
>> This mobile phone really bad vs Pc version

review: Game is mediocre. Nothing Like the pc version. The gameplay is fluid and great, but ranked gameplay is broken. U ban 10 champions, which is absurd. Not to mention that the win rate is fixed. There‚Äôs not a way to even rank up. I‚Äôve been stuck in silver rank. No matter the skill, I‚Äôm stuck at a 50% win rate. Have been a League player for ten years and this experience is horrible. I win a game then lose one. Win. Lose. Literally I play to just stay where I am.. mobile legends is by far a better mobile moba. Sorry. If u wanna play league, play on pc..

League needs to change some things up. If I‚Äôm doing really well almost every game but can‚Äôt get out of gold because the team loses for various reasons there‚Äôs a problem. 

The current system even with positive behavior, it‚Äôs impossible to rank up when the majority of the teams you‚Äôre placed in loses. 

I should be able to rise as a solo player without having to carry the team every game. It‚Äôs gets very frustrating and makes me want to stop playing. Also the targeting system glitches sometimes but that‚Äôs not a big problem.

Also I just went 9 kills 2 deaths and 10 assists with a victory  and my character score went down -4. Which doesn‚Äôt make ANY sense. Even if my characters score was at 1200 which it isn‚Äôt it was at 360, it doesn‚Äôt make sense it should‚Äôve been minimum +65.

review:
The game is fun. I like the lower stakes than league of legends. Instead of a 45 minute slog, when your team clearly doesn‚Äôt have what it takes to win, it‚Äôs a 15 minute wait til it‚Äôs over, and you can just practice on your own game for a few minutes.

The real problem: I always disconnect while on the loading screen before the game. It‚Äôs annoying and I‚Äôm pretty sure the game will ban me if it keeps happening because it has penalties for people who leave a game.

I‚Äôve been playing moba for a very long time, and this by far has the best of everything. The graphics, characters, controls just absolute perfection. I will say that the game is still in an infancy and for me it sometimes crashes with an iPhone SE. the reconnecting system after you crash is not so good compared of other moba for some reason. Other then that gameplay is perfect.

I give 3 star simply because there are lots to improve!!! But I really enjoy this game so far, no endless money consuming for extra, it‚Äôs all about game which I really enjoy so far, Nevertheless, it still looks like an early developed game which lack of all other Moba games feature! 1. Community community. 2. Clan, can we build our team? 3. Mastery, there are no show off on any display for mastery level except I do enjoy checking myself. 4. Please add more command on map experience.

Absolutely love this game and have invested so much time into this world. Which makes me excited to see it come to the big screen of consoles. Only problem with that, the news and feedback from the devs is almost nonexistent. I‚Äôm hoping 2023 will bring more clarity to what is clearly one of the best games you can put on your phone!

review:
I think that the AFK penalties should not be as severe as the base PC version. I am now banned for 2 hours and all I did was AFK for 2 minutes.(not ranked)

I recognize that you should not enter a game without being able to commit at least 15-20 minutes.

1. Sometimes I get a phone call that must be taken. It is a mobile game so these instances should be taken into account.

2. When you AFK it auto plays your character so the penalty shouldn‚Äôt be as if I never showed up.

3. Several games now I have had to AFK for various IRL reasons and still end up MVP just to get banned. 

I am not saying that there should not be a penalty but it should be generous as to not exceed an hour. If it were during a ranked game I think that is a different story.

As a long time player I‚Äôve never understood why, anyone could blame a game for someone else‚Äôs behavior. There are proactive measures that one can take, to avoid toxic people. If you get tilted, we‚Äôll that‚Äôs unfortunately the nature of people. NOT the game! I think Riot has made this mobile version something truly outstanding! Thank you Riot!
review_title: Guns don‚Äôt kill people; people kill people!

review:

review: Okay so this game is great but I'm having one problem.... I KEEP GETTING LOGGED OUT OF MY RIOT ACCOUNT!!!! seriously i need this fixed because i will try to load into a ranked match and then it will just continuously load for like 10 minutes and then i get logged out and I cant even reconnect so please fix this. (And yes I know its still in development.)

I get that you want us to re-earn champions we already own, but making us pay money for skins we already bought for this game is insanely lame. I would be more inclined to play if you didn‚Äôt throw my decade old account‚Äôs progress and vanity in the trash.

Please let skins sync at least. We earned that...

Otherwise the game plays quite well, and was surprisingly fun. I had low expectations due to many other games feeling wonky, but the auto attacking and last hitting solution was quite neat.

This game is completely trash compared to actual league. The items and abilities are dumbed down versions of their in game counter parts, some parts, such as life steal, omnivamp, and crit chance, don‚Äôt even work properly, and not to mention the ridiculous amount of auto attack aim that has been slapped on. You no longer have to worry about last hitting minions, because you gain more xp and gold sitting in base then you do actually laning, and to top it off games are way too short and often end due to pure luck rather than genuine skill. 0/10 Rito try again next year.

so I was playing at home and durring a match I get a emergency call and a have to get off the game soon to see I now have to wait 7 days to actually play the game‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ just don‚Äôt make the punishments to harsh man half the time it‚Äôs just stupid seeing you have a huge ban And another thing when you are not touching you screen for ONE SECOND YOU GET A ‚ÄúAfK bAn NoTiSe‚Äù that delays you game que for FIVE FLIPPING MINUTES! I love this game so much! I just have a few small drawbacks to it that I hope will be fixed in the future.
1: Healers. I love healers like Nami and Soraka, but I hope that in the future their attacks can do more damage, because using Soraka makes me VERY vulnerable while battling 1v1 because of her low-damaging attacks.
2: Pings. Honestly I LOVE pings, but I hope that the max could be 2 at a time. Even with the limit already, people still spam ping and it gets very annoying.
3. Chatting. Yes, chatting is very useful. But I hope that maybe you could add it so you can't be damaged while chatting to your teammates.

Btw, I recommend Malphite and Evelyn for close-combat people like me.

Thank you!

review:
JK, Riot. Don‚Äôt sue me. 

Even though I cannot stand the idea of pc games having difficult controls, having this ported to mobile makes this game so much easier to learn and play!  

Here is an idea: since Mobile Legends are doing what you do, why not do what they do? 

The controls on PC are a challenge for a guy like me to pick up yet it‚Äôs so much easier on MLBB. Why? They already take your stuff anyways? Time to get a little payback, amiright?!  

As for the game itself:  Love the game, fascinated by the story arc. I was stoked I got to test my wits against MLBB but now, I‚Äôm eager to sit behind this game and make it home. Thank you, Riot for igniting my love for games again.

If you enjoy LoL on PC, this is it for when you‚Äôre on the go. I‚Äôm military so I travel a lot. Playing this game on my iPad Pro keeps me sane! There are some differences in the maps and a few mechanical changes to the champs and items but they all make sense. The game indexes sooo well. If you‚Äôre on the fence, get off it. This is a very worthy mobile moba.

Wild rift has everything you want in a moba and more. The bad mobas on the app store are obvious, but I could tell this one took way more effort to make and plays out amazing. The changes on the champs to accommodate the smaller mad make for some new gameplay. The only complaint I have about this game are the toxic players, which no one can control.

Cons:

review:

review: Wild Rift is great but there is a game breaking bug and there doesn‚Äôt seem to be a fix for it yet. I agree to it and the same popup appears over and over again. Its been like this for 3 days, looping over and over again. Makes the game unplayable. Submitted a ticket 3 days ago and still no response yet for how to fix this.

Definitely enjoying it so far.  There are those players that don‚Äôt like the idea of a joystick and would much rather have the tap to move feature, but I personally really love the joystick movement controls.  Gameplay is smooth as long as your connection is stable and the graphics are fantastic.

review:
For being a new platform to translate League of legends to Riot really outdid themselves with getting the same feeling of league with a welcome twist.

I think the smaller map size and simplified versions of abilities works really well especially for a mobile version of league making it more fast paced and less work to keep up with.

Sadly my only qualm with the game so far would be that the NA server got into access in the "Second ranked season" of Wildrift so all the previous event shop items and a Ranked skin reward is impossible to get other than that I think its a faithful adaptation of league of legends that feels good to play and is a welcome change from the pc version.

Lots bang bang

Very mobile

Such legends

I think I had this on my preregistered que for 2 years wondering when it would ever get released. It's easily the best moba on the mobile platform. Movement controls and abilities function very similar to PC, easy to pick up and play. 

Most of the community in ranked is toxxic but it's league, it is a given.

What a pretty mobile game, look is well beyond the classic PC platform.  But that‚Äôs where it ends.  The interface response is industry worst.  Constant latency spikes which appear to freeze only your champion, while letting all other champs continue to move - and put you into respawn.  RITO blames VPN users, but what an easy fix to block them and leave the rest of us unaffected. Personally, it‚Äôs a lame excuse for such terrible gameplay performance.  Lots of promise, but this game is nowhere near ready for release.

It‚Äôs a really excellent mobile version of League of Legends, but wow does Riot have a lot of explaining to do allowing Teemo to exist for so many years in this game virtually unchanged. I hope whoever originally designed Teemo has had no further future career in video game design, because that is the most poorly designed character in video game history, no exaggeration.
review_title: Really good port, but Teemo still exists

review: Absolutely love the game. It‚Äôs smooth play style and being able to play with friends. The ranking system rocks! 10/10 game in my opinion. I am having an issue with my account not being able to purchase in game currency. I hope that gets fixed

One idea is grouping repeated toxic players into toxic-only games so other players can enjoy a relatively toxic-free game.

honestly, itd not half bad. in fact, i enjoy this game quite a bit... i play it daily and i really enjoy the game feel and interface. there are a few critiques though:

2. Find a way to ban toxic players. A lot of them just go unnoticed, and they have to be addressed.

3. Work more on the game buffs/nerfs. Every patch, there are a few champs who got adjusted just the right amount, but the rest are usually kinda dumb. Some champs even almost get ‚Äúforgotten.‚Äù (as a soraka main, she needs to be buffed but riot hasnt done so in the past several patches)

When people accidentally purchase the wrong thing. You can return food in any store. Why do they make it so hard to return on a mobile app. It‚Äôs not difficult.

Been playing mobas for years. This game Definitely needs a lot of adjustments/balances made over time but that is exactly what riot is great at. I think this will become one of, if not the most popular game on the market long term with access to smartphones. Love it.... release the champs, would love to see exclusive wild rift champs not tied to PC.

I get that the point of Wild Rift is a fast paced game that starts quickly, but this game seriously needs a queue dodging feature. When you get to mid ranked bad comps can be the determining factor in Wild Rift whereas in League you can still make it work. 

Sure I want to get in a game quick and they are only 15-20 mins but I‚Äôd rather lose 6 mins on a dodge then lose 20 mins because of an instalock janna top.
review_title: The game is awesome but missing key features.

review: Definitely I love the animations. However, as a pc player,I‚Äôm not complaining the game is not the same. However, tout should fix a way for player to play the game with only 2 hand 10 fingers. Too many bottom and really hard to play use only iPhone screen. Also you cannot set the map on the right hand side of the screen. Plz fix all that.
review_title: Why I feel uncomfortable about this game

review: I love this game but it is very frustrating to play as a support being forced to carry 4 people in ranked. The matchmaking/placement algorithm obviously needs work, and I believe the player base will improve along with this. Maybe something more tailored to your personal performance instead of just win/loss. Take hit accuracy and such into account, I'm sure it would keep a lot of people playing more!

I‚Äôve been a league fan since season two way way back. This game is spot on and captures the essence of what makes league so much fun to play in what are shorter and easier to digest games.

The App isn‚Äôt with out flaws and is missing some polish here and there but the dev team seems active and the player base is there for some really fun games.

developers (creators) should let people be able to just buy some of the collector/ Exclusive skins after a while instead of waiting for an  events that makes you spend ridiculous amount of diamonds for. if you made it to where we could get skins regularly without spending soo much diamonds that would be helpful and appreciated.
review_title: i slapped the miner to get my diamonds back

review: I just wanna say that i have been ranked and dranked multiple times because of the ranking system and how people get queued i have played a game where i was emerald and there was a gold on my team i dont understand how that would work because gold is 2 ranks lower than emerald so please fix the ranking system and match making system

Match rewards need to reflect the behaviors that win games. Games are won based on objectives and macro skills (minion control, using mini map, etc) but MVP always goes to the player with the most kills. So people play it like Call of Duty thinking they‚Äôre doing well cause they got 10 kills‚Ä¶ never mind they trotted off to the enemy jungle to chase an enemy champ while minions destroyed their towers. This is a strategy game, so reward good strategy.  Then it won‚Äôt be so frustrating for experienced players, cause newbies will come along faster.

This game has a poor match making system. Constantly matched with low Elo players which make climbing rank extremely frustrating. I‚Äôm a ok player if I match with players my level will prob be ok. I can‚Äôt carry 1v5 every single game. I‚Äôm quitting this game once again and will not look back. Also take a look‚Ä¶the dev doesn‚Äôt care. They even have bots replying the same messages to the reviews. What a joke

Edit: came back to play. Nothing changed. Same game same issues same toxic player base

I used to play this game so much on pc and then had to get away from it do to certain events in my life but now seeing it on mobile as spark my passion for the game back up and have fallen in love with it all over again. Also would really love to see Pyke added to the game.

I moved to live in another region and now I do not have access to my account.  I've been with you since beta testing, played 4000 games, all characters and about 20 skins are open in my account.  I was your big fan.  Spent a lot of money and time developing the account.  Now I don't have access to my account, I'm ready to create a new one, but riot don't want to transfer my donation.  I'm sorry, but with this attitude, I will not continue to be your customer.
review_title: I was your big fan. But now  I do not have access to my account.

review: A couple of months ago I left a review regarding toxic players inting and stealing positions. However after playing for a few months I‚Äôve realized, THEY DONT SPEAK ENGLISH. What is up with the servers riot, why are you putting so many Latin American players with North American players?! They don‚Äôt understand English nor do they adhere to the game, NOR DO THEY SURRENDER! PLEASE fix your matchmaking service. I‚Äôm tired of being stuck in a torture game for 30 minutes with people who don‚Äôt even UNDERSTAND THE SAME LANGUAGE AS ME.
review_title: FOR THE LOVE OF GOD. FIX THE LANGUAGE BARRIER

review: This game has great gameplay, but the ranked system is fundamentally flawed. Players on your team can go AFK in the first few minutes and the system even detects + announces this, but you still get demoted/lose points when you lose. It‚Äôs something that‚Äôs been easily solved for in other mobile MOBAS and even has been solved for in the PC game, but is glaringly lacking here. Makes the grind a waste of time when you get penalized for some other player going AFK

review:
Thank you so much for bringing this to mobile! 
You‚Äôve brought me back to my high school/ college days and I love every second of it. Straight nostalgia and the game is perfect. Of course there‚Äôs no mouse or anything but it‚Äôs easy to learn to tap just right. I love you guys so much and keep up the good work! 
-PoseidonG0W

I‚Äôd say every 3 or so games, I get a ‚Äúfailed to connect,‚Äù alert. It gives the option to reconnect but after buffering for 5 seconds it says failed to connect again. I‚Äôm almost certain it‚Äôs not my connection because my wifi is good enough to support league on my computer, also my WiFi and service bars are full.

I‚Äôve played PC LoL for awhile. Wild Rift is a great adaptation of the original and the mechanics are FAR superior to many similar style mobile games. The graphics are great, and always appreciate that in no way is this game pay to play. Obviously it‚Äôs not perfect, but definitely does not deserve some of the reviews written here.

I haven‚Äôt played league of legends on pc but this is pretty well done, balanced enough characters and plenty to choose from. Controls are tricky but you get used to them. Just don‚Äôt compare it to anything outside the mobile platform like an idiot.
review_title: #1 MOBA that you can also play anywhere

review: The game play is great, however being booted from games consistently then being marked as inactive/afk after finally being able to sign in again is more than frustrating. Developers need to take more time to look into people who are actually inactive/afk so those who may be experiencing server troubles don‚Äôt lose rank/progress so the game could be overall more enjoyable in its entirety. Maybe implement more updates to stabilize your NA servers?

Wild Rift is absolutely amazing, but there are a few problems with the servers and afk penaltys. I just got banned for an hour for afk. I didn‚Äôt even go afk though, and I was forcefully disconnected by the app. I checked and my internet was fine. Please make sure you‚Äôre giving penaltys to the right people for the right reasons.

You will struggle with hitting minions instead of champions just because they are closer to you, they have 2 different ways to target who u want but they are terrible, when a 5v5 fight is happening there‚Äôs no way i‚Äôm gna look for a tiny master yi icon to press, just to lock onto him, PLUS after u lock on, you have to unlock from them, or your champion won‚Äôt hit anything else!!

How can i enjoy the game when i can‚Äôt attack what i want to attack. 

TERRIBLE controls, i don‚Äôt think league is meant to be mobile sadly.

Highly disappointed,
0 team communication, 0 skilled players, and 0 attentiveness. Compared to the computer where communication was on point, people actually helped and did stuff. This is a terrible version of LoL when asking for assistance during a ranked 5v5 is like dealing with bots they have zero care and effort. When there‚Äôs 4v1 in a lane and asking for assistance you got the so call "teammates" doing nothing useful, some even jump into the enemy group to commit suicide honestly mobile legends is better. Really disappointed.

Very polished game interface where there is no clutter of annoying buttons and notifications that are constantly trying to get you to spend money. Great gameplay, mechanic and ambience. The release delay in the US was clearly worth the wait resulting in this masterpiece product.

If you‚Äôd like a mobile MOBA to pop in to while on the road without dedicating your life then look elsewhere. AFK for 2mins? Delay matchmaking for 3 minutes. Delayed match leads to less time to actually play, barely finish match but you were afk for 1 min to do anything because the match took forever to start so you extend the match making penalty. Thus creating a stupid cycle. Why do studios feel need to punish their playerbase if they don‚Äôt commit 100% to a VIDEO game. Christ be real, people have lives that interrupt things.
review_title: Not a casual game at all

review: I like the game, but I‚Äôm annoyed how long the matches take because I could be in the middle of one and have to do a chore and boom I‚Äôm banned for 2 hours because I left. I can‚Äôt play this game often because of how long the games are. I‚Äôm not asking to change it but I‚Äôm not constantly leaving games so I don‚Äôt get why I‚Äôm being banned for hours.

Tried playing ranked. Estimate queue time was about 30 seconds. Waited 20 minutes then got a timeout saying to try again. Tried again, 15 man bites later got an issue saying another player did not ready up. Another 20 minutes later got another timeout. What the duck is that 30 second estimate? I wasted an hour trying to play this game. Riot ban yourself for being AFK. I tried to play this game, but it didn‚Äôt let me, so im going back to playing other games I can actually play and enjoy.

review:
Destined to fail...Not the game; you. ABSOLUTELY NO SOLO RANKED QUEUE. Computer version of game has separate solo ranked queue to ensure some semblance of fair play.

Unless you have the time/energy to team up with four coordinated friends; you will have an automatic disadvantage every, single, match; regardless of solo skill. You will only rank so far prior to reaching a definite solo rng ceiling. Random afkers, enemy feeders, and multi-role players only add to this statistical inevitability.

Two options: (1) Ensure playing with 4 coordinated friends or (2) waste your life in the futile attempt to play 5 vs 1 over and over and over again.

I absolutely love this game and everything about it but I still have one question(and this is out of curiosity, not to offend anyone). When will Volibear and Ornn be added? These are me and my brothers favorite characters. Again this was just out of curiosity, not to offend anyone.

Also nerfs and buffs give so much unbalance in matches. This is not League of Legends, this is something way worst. Uninstalling rn.

review:
Matches last a bit too long, 20+ minutes, with queue time and draft, it takes approx 25 minutes just to play one game. And it‚Äôs wasted if you happen to have a bad team, which happens very very often.

You might need to play an hour or two at minimum to have a good time, which utterly goes against the notion of quick fun on mobile. Really not sure where this game is going.
review_title: Too time consuming, an inefficient way to have fun

review: Wild rift is a very fun game and is very similar to pc version. It‚Äôs great how bugs are fixed right away for better experience but I always have this bug with my game. Where is my volume is down and I open the game it blast the sound and makes it full volume so I didn‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the game or my phone cuz any other app doesn‚Äôt do this.

I had been playing PC league for about 5 years. Then this came out. It‚Äôs a lot more stress free than the PC version. The matches are shorter‚Ä¶. That‚Äôs mainly what I love about it. Not to mention the ranking system isn‚Äôt total garbage and doesn‚Äôt require you to discard your social life to climb the ladder!

Plays similar enough to the pc version old fans will feel at home.  Generally stellar mobile game, one of the few without constant ads and for a change a mobile game that‚Äôs made to be fun not just capitalize on micro transactions.  No pay to win!

This game could be the best MOBA but Riot doesn‚Äôt care. Fix the matchmaking, better team communication, and for the love of Mike stop penalizing ranked players if they have an AFK. Currently stuck as a mostly solo Platinum player because every other game we have an AFK and I end up losing a rank. Other games don‚Äôt penalize the team if this happens and if it happens in a party they penalize the whole party. Instead of all the skins and wild rift packs fix the mechanics first. The forums are full of legitimate complaints. So disappointing.

Not half bad in general, but the biggest miss here is how easy it would be to add general controller support. Two joysticks for movement and aiming, bumpers/triggers for skills, hold an extra button to upgrade skills... even having a hybrid interface would work, this seems like low hanging fruit to bring the game to the next level.

Great game. It‚Äôs honestly my favorite thing from Riot Games. But there is one bug that is preventing this review from giving the game 5 stars. After I play three games and Queue up for the next one, the game disconnects and won‚Äôt let me in. I try to reload and every other trick I know of to get back in but it will not let me play. Please fix this, Riot. I really want to grind this game but I can‚Äôt with this current bug

The game quality is one of the best I have seen and I absolutely love it. Only thing that might make it that much better would be maybe adding controller support since that is the way the controls interface right now are very much in line with a physical controller unlike the pc version.
review_title: Amazing game just one more thing

review: It's only 40 reviews, maybe because it's the first day of release. Something I would really like is too be able to give already bought skins to friends. Sometimes when I open a random poro skin chest I‚Äôm not happy with my skin. Can you guys make a way to give away skins you don‚Äôt want to others? Cause right now the skins I don‚Äôt want are just sitting there and it‚Äôs a bit of a waste.

This has the best graphics, mechanics & overall feel to it. Blows mobile bang out of the park. But‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm gonna jump straight to the point. 

‚ÄúIm in diamond lobby going against grandmasters & challengers‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve been playing this game for 4 months & I‚Äôm already going against the best??‚Äù

Where‚Äôs the skill cap & match making? I think the biggest issue is that there isn‚Äôt enough players so I gotta go against the best. I would like to hit masters but I can‚Äôt even get out of d4. 

I have no prior experience in wild rift or LoL. I‚Äôd like to just go against other diamond players. Maybe around d1 I go against a couple masters grandmasters & challengers?? Idk just really discouraging. I kinda want to uninstall & not play anymore. :/

review: Here I am, excited to play league mobile and every time I join a game it crashes. I start the game up 10+ times it crashes. review:
Dear Devs, 

I love this game but you got to do something about AFK. Most specifically the start of the Match, too much times i got AFK at the start of the game and I have to force to play a 4vs5 matchup. How is that even fair? I suggest a "remake" option. I know that you guys worry that people will abuse this system. Then at least add a function that if you're the MVP/Best player on the losing, don't make you lost any point. 
Because it is frustrating to fight a battle you know you not gonna win and have to give up when it's not even your own fault. 

Please Devs look in this.

Your loyal fan base,
UwU

I have been playing this for a while, and this is exactly what I wanted, a mobile LoL. I have been playing Mobile Legends which is based on this one. This game is probably the same as the LoL on the PC, so I don‚Äôt know if they should name it ‚ÄúWild Rift. Overall, this game is great, and I love the heroes. Keep up the good work!!!

The connection stability to the game is not very reliable. I can be sitting right next to my wifi router with a rock solid internet connection and the app fails to connect to the game servers on a regular basis. I even attempted to connect via cellular data and still a no-go so it‚Äôs not my connection it‚Äôs the app. If you really want to play this game. Perhaps wait a month or two, HOPEFULLY by then they‚Äôll have these irritating bugs worked outside.

I‚Äôve been playing League PC since season 3 and I love this version. After I got used to the controls I fell in love. It‚Äôs feels like classic but at a faster pace. All the game knowledge I had from classic made it easy to climb to Emerald and I love that chat isn‚Äôt as acceptable so it doesn‚Äôt feel as toxic. They nailed this!

The matchmaking is rigged, if you ever go on a ranked winning streak prepare to get nothing but trolls and afkers to bring down your win rate. The dirty trick is that they try to keep everyone at 50% win rate so that you are more inclined to keep playing, so if you go on a winning streak they try to artificially boost people with lower win ratings by putting them on your team which either helps them achieve putting those with lower win rates back up to 50% or lower yours to 50%. Whatever happened to competitive integrity?

You‚Äôll be in Diamond and get silver and unrated players in rank that don‚Äôt know the basics sometimes. It is the worst idea they have ever done. Don‚Äôt spend any money on this game until they fix it. You‚Äôll lose days of ranking in just a few hours because you get paired with people who aren‚Äôt  even in the same rank and don‚Äôt know how to group. I‚Äôm going back to arena of valor until they fix this. They need to fire the ahole who thought this algorithm for matchmaking was good.

Apparently using a 3rd party app such as cash app or PayPal , sets a pending payment on your account if you do not have the funds, but it stays regardless if the purchase was made or not. So when said funds are added at a later time interval, the pending transaction just happens anyway taking your money and leaving you with no said purchase. This has happened at least three different occasions, not only is this predatory but in fact a huge flaw. Please fix

review: I‚Äôve never been a huge fan of games like these, but when I got it it got me hooked immediately. The only thing I might want to change is to make blitzcrank a tiny bit tanker. He could have a bit more health, and do some more damage.

Very cool game. I have never played LOL ever, so this was my introduction to the game. I was very happy at first.

However, I find the game very toxic.

1. There are lot of AFK players. Every single day I have minimum 1 afk player. One time I had 4 consecutive afks. And if our team loses, we still get demoted which I find extremely unfair. Why the heck I‚Äôm being punished for others fault? 

2. I get matched with lower ranks. I play in a gold tier, but I frequently get silver members in my team that clearly do not now how to play. Why can‚Äôt you match gold with gold and silver with silver? 

I frequently get SVP and glorious defeat, because I think I play well.  But I can‚Äôt get up in rank, because I play as a support. So I can‚Äôt carry the game all by myself unlike fighters/marksman....T_T

Very polished gameplay. Doesn‚Äôt feel like a money grab (yet). Plays like a tighter, more polished version of Arena of Valor. Very accessible, and offering about 20 heroes free through easily accomplished gameplay objectives is a great way to kick things off. 

I‚Äôm still a big fan of Onmyoji Arena‚Äôs gameplay, but Wild Rift has held my attention so far.

Although I change my network it still won‚Äôt let me back into the game until it ends which I have to start another game. Also it‚Äôs not really that worth it to have pc is better than mobile.

Riot‚Äôs done a great job to bring this game to mobile. They made the games much faster than regular League on PC/Mac. Games now take 15-20 minutes versus 30-45 minutes. Much easier to pop in, play, then pop out. They give you a lot of champions and skins for free up front which is nice!

They completely changed crafting bloodthirster has no crit the boots are screwed up some items are missing and one of the first characters added to the game on pc isn‚Äôt in the mobile port the auto attack system is retarded lots of skins are missing if you use your riot account you don‚Äôt even have any skins. If you spend any money on league of legends just do it on the pc this port is complete trash. And I‚Äôm pretty sure rp to money rate is worse on this.

review:

I‚Äôm still learning the game and going up against high ranked people and it makes it not fun! Highest an unranked player can take is probably silver or gold, not plat and diamonds!

Only one thing that would make this game great and that‚Äôs‚Ä¶ controller support. It might not be a big deal to some but to most of us it is. We‚Äôd all be grateful if this was to happen and enjoy the game even more.

Mobile or not, this game and gameplay mechanics are really good. Where it utterly fails is matchmaking and fair gameplay. There are way to many people afking, griefing or just straight out not
interested in playing as a team.

Add in non-regional servers and you end up going from high emerald to gold in one session. Thats like 20-25 losses in a row from the above issues.

While you can report players, it doesnt change that you just spent 20+ minutes playing with them only to have to do it all over again next match.

In short whatever ELO/MMR system they are using does not work. Other companies will group these kind of players together. Until they fix the matchmaking issues I‚Äôm done with this MOBA.

The game has horrible matchmaking. If u do good in your games you will be paired with bad players that AFK, lag, or feed a lot.

Also, the bracket ranking system is absolutely GARBAGE, they bring you players that are way below your bracket in rank. For example you get 3 silver team mates when you are in gold, or 4 gold team mates when you are in platinum.

It's horrible, and it brings about frustration among the community, this leads to bad reviews about the horrible matchmaking this game has.

Absolutely ridiculous.

Wild Rift is a great game ruined by its light hearted punishments against these ridiculous players. Until matchmaking and punishment system is fixed, this game will have its ratings lowered.

review: I‚Äôve played League of Legend for a long time and have enjoyed Wild Rift. I love this game for its excellent optimization in control and visual. I‚Äôm so glad and thankful that game developers took their time and published a highly polished mobile game.

It doesn‚Äôt compare to the PC League of Legends experience by any means, but it‚Äôs a great on the go MOBA!
I love regular League, and I love Wild Rifts. 
I prefer the PC version, but when I‚Äôm not in the mood to sit at my desk, I can still get my fill.
My only complaint is that ARAM is only around for what feels like a very short period every once in a while, and sometimes I just don‚Äôt wanna play on the Rift and want something faster-paced. 
Regardless, it‚Äôs still very fun, and it IS League of Legends, but simpler and so easy for new players to pick up.
Download if! You won‚Äôt regret it üòä

Game runs smoothly. You have support for phones that have 120hz displays which is always nice (I have an iPhone so that doesn‚Äôt matter to me.) Graphics in the mobile game are better than in the PC game, surprisingly. 

Makes me wonder if league is due for a graphical overhaul sometime in the near future.

I have been a lol player since 2012 and this game makes me nostalgic for the early days. It is well polished and not too complex for a more casual gamer to pick up. I can really see the investment Riot put into this game.
Great Game. Been playing since season 2. All the small updates you guys keep releasing freezes and wont let me click the prompt‚Ä¶. Other then that, amazing game.

Lots of potential but they kept so much of the toxic game design from the pc version so you may as well play that. Jailing players in games with feeders and trolls and threatening to ban them when they have to talk to their mom for 30 seconds is literally the most dictator-esque construct in gaming today originating from League on PC. It‚Äôs clearly not going as well for them on mobile.

So I‚Äôm a pc league player that also plays a lot of mobile moba games but to be honestly the only good thing about this game is the characters lore and it‚Äôs popularity on pc is what‚Äôs making it‚Äôs good I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this game. I played a little bit of this game but it just doesn‚Äôt feel the same

Game as of right NOW (March 2021), feels less bursty than PC League. Which is great in my opinion.
